text: Ŋkɔ nye enye Kossi, o dzim le damɛ ŋkeke blawe vɔ ene, le eƒe akpe ɖeka alafa asieke blanyi vɔ ɖekɛ lia dzi(24/05/1981).
Etɔnye ŋkɔ enye Kounoudji etso Tado-Domé (Moyen-Mono) eye enɔnye ŋkɔ enye Akouvi tso Kouma-Aɖamé (Kloto nuto me).
Meɖo nɔvi nyɔnuvi eve kple nɔvi ŋsuvi eve
Mewu nye suku nu le « Université de Lomé » eye me hɔ diplom si ŋkɔ enye « Maîtrise en Gestion » le efe akpe eve kple adɛ me(2006).

Meva Polonyi zi gbãtɔ le eƒe akpe eve kple adrɛ lia me (2007) to AIESEC ƒe ɖoɖo nu, na enu fiafia kuɖe akɔta kple adzɔ dodo nya wo ŋti le polonyi ƒe suku kɔkɔ wo si ŋkɔ nye « szkoła średnia » le Wielkopolska ƒenu towo me.
Le eyiyi ma me la, mekpo be monu kpokpo le ŋtinye, be mateŋ ade suku kɔkɔ lafiyi.

Eye esi metrɔ yi Togo le ɣleti gbãto ƒe ŋkeke wiatɔ liadzi le eƒe akpe eve kple enyi la me la (15/01/2008), me tamɔ be ma va yi suku nye dzi le afiyi (Poznan), elabena suku fɛa me sɔgbɔ la fiyi o, eye medi hã vevie be ma de sukua le aɣlisigbeme.
Metrɔwa Polonyi le dasiamime ŋkeke wiatɔ liadzi le eƒe akpe eve kple enyi liadzi (15/08/2008) vaseɖe ŋkeke sia dzi.
Menye ɖekakpui aɖe si dzina dzɔdzɔɛ nye nye, anukɔɖe kple ŋtifafa eye me wɔdɔ vevie elabena me kãɖedzi be edɔwɔwɔ ɖeka ko ateŋ a ɣe vovo va na ame siame.
Nye dzidzi enye be ma trɔ ŋɖe le hehe ya me, ma ʋli ŋtifafa eye ma kpeɖe wɔamenɔ kple fukpelawo ŋti.
Taɖodzi nye enye be ma wɔdɔ eye emegbe la, ma ʋu nye ŋtɔ ƒe adzɔ nu le esɔ me.
Eye nye ŋkɔ ƒoɖo nya enye be “Afrika dukɔwo ɣia vovo kpokpo”.
Ŋkɔ nye enye Kossi
Tɔgbe nye ŋkɔ enye AFOUTOU Kodjovi Akpan, enye ame dzɛ aɖe si tso Tado, teƒe si le ɣedzepe godzi eye wo nye ame dzesi aɖe le Tado-Domé.
Kpui ɖe ko la, enye vodu nɔ gã aɖe tsã vayi, si ɖo vodu hapopo si wɔa kɔnu vovovowo eye dukɔa kãtã nyɛ nɛ.
Ekpa eha vovovowo ɣe doa eƒe vodu la ƒe ŋkɔ ɖedzi eye le woƒe kɔnu wɔwɔ eyiyi hã.
Enɔ esia dzi vasɛɖe esime wo trɔ dzime zu Katoliko hɔsetɔ vãvEtrɔ dzime alegbegbe be egbe nu le abosãŋ kple eƒe nuwɔna vovovowo gbɔ.ã.
Etrɔ dzime alegbegbe be egbe nu le abosãŋ kple eƒe nuwɔna vovovowo gbɔ.
Ekpa eha geɖe na Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ dodoɖedzi eye amewo dzina neneŋ ƒe eha wo le tsotsi hɔ alo gbedohɔ me ɣena vivi dodoɖe subɔ subɔ ɖe Mawu ŋti.

Amewo nya eƒe hawo ale gbegbe be esi Papa Yohanes Paolo ewe lia va Togo le eƒe akpe ɖeka bla sieke kple enyiʋɔ atɔ le ɣleti enyi lia me (08/1985) la, wo yɔɛ be wɔa va dziha nɛ le eƒe misa me, eye emegbe la eyi Papa gbɔ va dziha nɛ.
Edze be ma ɖo ŋku edzi be, le eyiyi ma wome la fada ameve tso Polonyi nɔ Tado-Domé ƒe katoliko hanɔƒea.
Eƒe eha vevi dometɔ ɖeka enye « Mawu nya vivi » eye eha ƒe eme nyawo enye :
Mawu nya vivi
Akpan be mawu nya vivi ŋtɔ (2x)
Ameɖe gbe Mawu nya ŋdi kɛnyɛ
Fiɛ sime ɖo afoku la va dzedzie (2x)
Edze vivinɔ
Ɣehowa be edze vivinɔ
Dzeɖe gbebe eye ma vivivo
Ye woa sɔ kɔŋgbe aso afo so lidzi.

text: Le Eʋe dukɔwo mela, ŋkɔ nye dzesiaɖe, eye dzigbe ŋkeke nyena ŋkeke tɔxɛ na Eʋevi ɖesiaɖe klui.

text: Dzigbezã alo dzigbe ŋkɔ ateŋ aƒonu kuɖe amesi tsɔ ŋkɔla ƒe tsɔme ŋti.

text: Tso Dzoɖa ŋkekedzi vasede Kɔsiɖa ƒe ŋkekedzi la, ŋkeke ɖesiaɖe ɖo dzigbe ƒe ŋkɔ, eye neneŋ ƒe ŋkɔ ɖena amesi tsɔ ŋkɔla ƒe aƒevi nyenye fiana.

text: Dzigbezã alo dzigbe ŋkɔ ateŋ aƒonu kuɖe amesi tsɔ ŋkɔla ƒe tsɔme ŋti.

text: Miele nu ŋlɔge tso neneŋ ƒe ŋkɔ kple eƒe tsɔme nyawo ŋti le enyasio gbɔna la me :

text: Dzoɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Dzoɖaviwo nye na amefafa wo, wo me ʋlinaɖo kaba kaba le enuwo ŋti o, vɔ gake to egbɔ be woateŋ a tsidzi hã la, wo buna tame ŋtɔ hafi wo wɔnanu
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Dzoɖaviwo me lɔnabe yewoa dzagɔ le amedzi o, eye wo haanu alegbegbe nenye be wo wɔnu davo le amebubu ŋti.

text: Dzoɖaviwo lɔna ame vevie eye wo tsɔnanu doadzidzɔ ɖe woƒe ameveviewo alo woƒe lɔlɔtɔwo ŋti, wo dzina hã be amewo nelɔ yewo abe yewo lɔwo ene, eye ameɖokui tsɔtsɔ savɔ ɖe amebubuta nyena dzoɖavio ƒe agbemenyawo.

text: Lɔlɔ nye nu tɔhɛ na wo.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Dzoɖaviwo dzina be yewoa wɔ nugãwo le agbeme eye wo nɔna drɔɛgãwo kukum, wo ga nyena amesiwo nɔna dzikudom edzi edzi eye le eyiyiaɖewo megbe kola, wobe dziku dodoa nu va yina enumake.

text: Braɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Braɖaviwo nyena amesiwo nyananu kuɖe amegbetɔ ƒomea ŋti.

text: Wo ga nyena amesiwo kpɔna dzidzɔ alo wɔna vividodoɖe amehaviwo ŋti.

text: Nublanui kpɔkpɔɖe amehaviwo ŋti nyena enusi hɔna teƒe geɖe le woƒe agbewome.

text: Braɖaviwo ɖoato amewo nyuie, woƒe nugɔmesese nye kpɔɖeŋu eye le nenemanu ke woƒe dziku dodo kaba kaba hã vaname ema.

text: Braɖaviwo nye amesiwo lɔnabe yewoa nye amekplɔlawo alo zimenɔlawo alo amenunɔlawo.

text: Braɖaviwo kpɔna dzidzɔ alegbegbe eye tamesusu nyuie hã nɔna wosi alebe enuenula, wo dzinabe yewoa wɔ nusi dze alo nusi nye nuteƒe la.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Braɖaviwo nyena amesiwo nyananu nyuie eye woƒe nusɔsrɔ wɔnawo le suku dzenaedzi nawo nyuie alegbegbebe, edɔwɔwɔ kude agbãle ŋti alo asinu dɔwɔwɔ nye enusi ɖenavi nawo ŋtɔ.

text: Braɖaviwo lɔna enumama kple wohaviwo eye wo ɖona enukomo ɖe wohaviwo ŋti.

text: Kuɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Le kuɖaviwo ƒe dzɔdzɔmekela, woyɔfu kple ʋliʋlidodo kpakple edzitsitsi, eye wonɔ edzitsim le eyiyi geɖewome le wɔnaɖewoŋu.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kuɖaviwo nyena amesiwo dzena agbagba geɖe eye ga sɔ yi edzila, wo nyena amesiwo nye nyateƒe tolawo le ɣeyiyigeɖewo me.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kuɖaviwo ƒe dzitsitsi va nanabe woƒe nuwɔnawo ɖeadzi leƒo na wohaviwo le ɣeyiyiaɖe wo me.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kuɖaviwo ʋuna woƒe dzime na wo haviwo fa, eye wo kuaɖe wohaviwoŋu vevie.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Wo dzina hã be, yewoa nye kpɔneŋu le ƒome gbenɔnɔme, vo gake edzi edzi la, nugɔme mase mase nana be wome kpɔna dzidzeme le srɔgbenɔnɔ me o.

text: Kuɖaviwo lɔna alɔnudɔwɔwɔ nyuie.

text: Wo nɔna aza ɖuɖu alo dzidzɔ kpɔkpɔ teƒewo eye wo lɔna atsɔ wɔwɔ ŋtɔ.

text: Yawoɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Yawoɖaviwo nye amesiwo tsɔna woƒe tame susu alo tagomenya ko sɔ wɔna dɔ, elabena wome ɖoato amebubu aɖeke o, eye yawoɖaviwo ƒe tonu mase mase nana be wo wɔna nusi woɖoɖe dzidzi ko.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Yawoɖaviwo ɖenabla wɔna nu kaba kaba kple tamesusu ko be yewo ma ɖoto amebubu o.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Wo nyena amesiwo ateŋ anya agbãlɛ nyuie alo ateŋ awɔ asinudɔ nyuie, vɔ toegbɔ be wome ɖoato amewo wola, yawoɖaviwo ƒe nunya alo ŋgɔgbe dede nyena kame tete geɖe le woƒe agbe wome.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Vɔ gake yawodaviwo nye amesiwo lɔna ƒome gbe nɔnɔ eye wo wɔna ƒomeme ƒe nyawo nyuie, elabena wo nya alesi woateŋ aƒonu le amedomee.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Wo ganyena amesiwo nɔ dziku dom ko eye woƒe fulele tɔgbe meli o.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Fiɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Fiɖaviwo nye vevie dola gãwo, wo lɔna ŋsɛ dɔwɔwɔ aklaɖi tɔɛ eye wo ga nyena kãlɛ wɔlawo kpakple kutri kulawo.

text: Fiɖaviwo ƒe susu wome ʋu nyuie eye wo nyena ŋzɔnɔlagãwo le ƒome alo edume.

text: Vevie dodo nana be fiɖaviwo nyena suku dela nyuie kple asinudɔ wɔla nyuie wo.

text: Wo ɖena susu nyuie wo alegbegbe eye wo lɔna bubu dede amewo ŋti ɖe nɔnɔmenyuie tɔme.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Fiɖaviwo lɔna wo srɔwo alegbegbe kpakple woƒe viwo ŋtɔ eye ebe lele na ƒome nyena enu hɔasi le woƒe ŋkume.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Vɔkela, fiɖaviwo ʋaaŋu alegbegbe eye wo me nana nu ame ko o, wo nana nu ame kple susu be enua wɔa ɖevi.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: MEMLƐƉA: ŋkeke adelia – memlɛɖaviwo

text: Memlɛɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Memlɛɖaviwo nye amesiwo nɔanyi kpoo, wo me nye tukaɖa wɔlawo o.

text: Memlɛɖaviwo lɔna adɔme nyuie wɔwɔ, wo wɔna kpekpedeŋu geɖe na amewo eye wo ga sena veve ɖe amewota.

text: Memlɛɖaviwo lɔna ame le nyateƒe kple anukɔaɖe me eye ŋkume nuwɔwɔ me nye nusi doa dzidzɔ na wo o.

text: Memlɛɖaviwo nyena ame fafa wo, wo me doa dɔmedzu kabakaba o, ŋku leleɖe nuŋu nye enusi wo lena vevie ɖe akɔ, wo nye amesiwo hɔ yayra tso Wɔla gbɔ, wo kpɔa ŋgɔgbe yiyi nyuie le enu gede wome eye dzɔgbe nyuie nɔna wo yome esiayi.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: KOSIƉA: ŋkeke adrɛlia – kosiɖaviwo
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Eme vio tɔna ŋkɔ siawo :
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Ŋsuwo : Kɔsi, Kɔsivi, Kɔsigã, Kwasi
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Nyɔnuwo : Kɔsiwa, Kɔsiwavi, Kɔsiwagã, Akɔsiwa

text: Kɔsiɖaviwo ƒe agbeme wɔnawo kple woƒe nunana tso wɔla gbɔ Kɔsiɖaviwo nye gbɔgbɔmeviwo, Mawu tsitsitre le woƒe gbɔgbɔme eye wo ga nye Mawu ƒe dɔtsɔlawo.

text: Kɔsiɖaviwo yɔfu kple ablɔɖenyenye kpakple vovokpɔkpɔ.

text: Wo nye amesiwo kpɔna nublanui na amewo, wo doa vevie nu ŋtɔ eye kutri kuku nye woƒe akpo hɔnu elabe, ne eva vɛme be kɔsiɖaviwo dze anyi la, wo ga fɔna enumake.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kɔsiɖaviwo yɔfu kpakple lɔlɔ eye wo tsɔ woƒe agbeblibo kpakple woƒe ŋsɛwo kãtã lɔna ame.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Suku me nyawo doadzidzɔ na kɔsiɖaviwo eye agbãlɛ dɔwɔwɔwo ɖeavi nawo nyuie, elabena woƒe tagbɔ kɔ.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kɔsidaviwo lɔna fiaɖuɖu le nuwo nu, eye le afisiafi si wo le la, wo ɖea woɖokuiwo fia to wɔna geɖewome.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kɔsiɖaviwo nyena amesiwo ɖea susu he wɔanu alo he ɖoa aɖaŋu nyuiwo. Kɔsiɖaviwo maanu kple dzidzɔ tso dzimeke.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Kɔsiɖaviwo maanu kple dzidzɔ tso dzimeke.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Enya siawo tɔ asi enu etɔ dzi le Eʋe dukɔwo me: ŋkɔ sɔsɔ, ŋkuɖoɖo dzigbe ŋkeke dzi kpakle ŋkɔ ɖesiaɖe ƒe emenyawo.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Edzi edzi neneŋ ƒe nyawo va vana eme nenema le amewo ƒe agbeme.
category: Ewe personal names corresponding to various weekdays

text: Ne nyɔnu aɖe le evi dzim eye wo le kukum nɛ la, o wɔna kɔnu na ɖevi yeye si wo ga dzi la, to ŋkɔ bubu tsɔtsɔ nɛ la me, bena ɖevi yeyela me ga ku ke o.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ŋkɔ sia nye na ŋkɔ si ke ame bubu tsɔna na ɖevia si gɔme enye be ehɔ ɖevi la ƒle le ƒomea si.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ame si hɔ ɖevi la ƒlela tsona ƒome bubu me alo dukɔ bubume alo edu bubume alo amedzro tso duta, vɔa nyui tɔ enye be amea ne nye amedzro tso duta.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Kɔnua wo yina ale: evinɔ si ga dzi ɖevi bubu alo evi yeye la ƒe ƒomea yina ɖe mɔdododzi, he da ɖevi yeye la ɖe mɔ dodome, he yina bena ɖe gbetime alo aveme he nɔ ŋku sam na amesi ato afima afɔ ɖevi la.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ne ame aɖe vayina to afimagodzi he kɔ ɖevia la, le emayi me la ƒomea doa dzesi amema alo bena kplɔna neneŋ ƒe amea ɖo, ne wome dzesi o, he nyana afisi nye amedrola ƒe afeme alo afisi wo da ɖevilaɖoe.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Emegbe la ɖevila ƒe pomea ɖona to, he tɔna tekpɔ ekpɔ dodo tso ɖevi fɔfɔ ŋti, eye ne wose kpododo tso ɖevi fɔfɔ ŋti la, enumake wo yina he gblɔna be miavie.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Esiao kãtã vayina le ga ƒoƒo aɖeo me
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ɖevi yeye la ƒe ƒomea nana mɔnu kpɔkpɔ amesi fɔ ɖevi la be woa ɖu tɔ nɛ.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ie ɣemayi mela ame si fɔ ɖevila, nana ŋkɔ bubu si dzroe ɖevila, ŋkɔ sia ateŋ anyi Fɔfɔe alo Ofɔe alo Oƒle…… ne amesi fɔ ɖevi yeyela me na ŋkɔa ɖekee o.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Evi fɔla si trozu ɖevila ƒe tɔ evelia la, ateŋ ne elɔla, ahɔ ɖevila ɖe eɖokui gbɔɛ le ɖevila ƒe sisime alo ɖevima ateŋ anɔ egbɔ yim le aza dzilo alo lekuhɛ me.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Esiao wɔwɔ, hena emɔ na, eku be mega dzesi ɖevi yeye la o, elabena etɔ ŋkɔ bubu.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Edzi edzi la kadodo nɔna ɖevila ƒe ƒomea kple ɖevila ƒe tɔ evelia dome kuɖe ɖevila ƒe nyawo ŋti.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Ele be ma ɖo ŋku edzi be amesi fɔ ɖevila ɖo la nye ŋsu, ne me nye nenema ola, ele be woa ga gbugbɔ dze kɔnua gɔme.
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: (Kɔnu sia nye kɔnuaɖe si sɔkple, ne woa gblɛ kpuiɖe ko la, Moiz ƒe ŋti nyao le bibla me)
category: Story of naming a baby by a foreigner

text: Elabena miexɔ kluvigbɔgbɔ, bene miaganɔ vɔvɔ̃m o; ke vinyenyegbɔgbɔ la boŋ miexɔ, esi me miedo ɣli le be: Aba, Fofo!.
Gake esi Yudatɔwo kpɔ amea la, wogblɔ be: “Egbee nye Sabat, eye womeɖe mɔ na wò be, natsɔ wò aba o.”
Eyome la, eya ŋutɔ ƒoa ka nam be masrɔ̃ nu kpli ye, ɣeaɖewoɣi la, hafi mafɔ le aba dzi gɔ̃ hã; eye ɣeaɖewoɣi la, eƒoa ka nam zi eve gbe ɖeka.
Esi nyemetea ŋu fɔna le aba dzi kaba o ta la, menana wòƒoa ga henyɔnam ɖe game dzi.
Elektrik ŋusẽ alo aba menɔ anyi o, eye pɔmpimetsi alo afɔdzi menɔ anyi o.
Ame bubuwo ƒe fifia kple wo ŋu tsro te ŋu tsia aba si wozã kpɔ me eye nugbagbevi siwo lɔ̃a ɖi ate ŋu anɔ eme fũ siwo ate ŋu aho gbɔxi, klabi, alo dɔ bubuwo na wò.

Esi teƒe aɖeke mele asinye mamlɔ o ta la, meyina ɖanɔa tiidzraƒe aɖe si le kɔƒea me vaseɖe esime teƒea dzikpɔlawo dometɔ mamlɛa dzo—zi geɖe la enyea zãtiƒe—heɖoa aba mlɔa anyi ahafɔ kaba le ŋufɔke hafi teƒea tɔ dzea nudzadzra gɔme.
Wolia xɔa tame si le gbadzaa la, eye woŋɔ etame heɖiɖiabala kple lãmetututɔ si le edzi la ɖe Yesu xa tututu.
Mele egblɔm na mi be, le zã ma me la, ame eve amlɔ aba ɖeka dzi; woakplɔ ɖeka, ke woagblẽ evelia ya ɖi.
Etrɔ ɖe lãmetututɔa ŋu heɖe gbe be: “Mele egblɔm na wò bena: Tsi tre, tsɔ wò aba, ne nayi aƒewò me.”
Ŋutsu ene ye tsɔe ɖe aba sue aɖe dzi.

Ke ɖe wòle be míaxɔe se azɔ be esi lãmenugbagbevi siwo nɔ Maria ƒe vidzidɔ me mã gagbugbɔ mã ake la, “Mawu blibo la katã” nɔ ʋukɔe ɖeka me eye wòtsi le eƒe fufɔfɔ ƒe ɣleti gbãtɔ me henɔ sue wu asibide ƒe aba ɖeka mamã ɖe ene me ƒe ɖeka, eye ŋku kple towo nɔ totom ɖe eŋu suesuea?
Ne amewo mlɔ anyi le ŋutifafa me gake wò ya nèle mimlim le aba dzi gaƒoƒo geɖe, eye wò ŋkuwo ʋu ɖi la, enyea nusi medoa dzidzɔ na ame kura o.
Gake woate ŋu able alo aba amesiwo menya agbalẽ o la bɔbɔe wu bubuawo, le esi womate ŋu axlẽ agbalẽ siwo kloa nu le amebeble mawo dzi o ta.
Ẽ, ne eɖo aƒemedɔ wɔwɔ dzi la, Lododowo 26:14 sɔna na ame aɖewo siwo le xɔme kple ame be: “Alesi ʋɔtru trona le eƒe megbega me la, nenema nye kuviatɔ leabadzi.”
Nenema ke ne nɔviwo le tsitsim la manyo be ŋutsuvi kple nyɔnuvi namlɔabaɖeka dzi alo xɔ ɖeka me ne woate ŋu axe mɔ ɖe esia nu hafi o.
Egblɔ bena: “Metsɔ ŋkɔ na nye fiase sue la be Nudanuawo, elabena nye nudanuwo hã le nudanu ʋɛ siwo ŋu wometrɔ asi le le asi bliboa me be woatsɔ aba amee o la dome.
Mlɔeba la, woɖiɖiabasi dzi dɔnɔa mlɔ la ɖɔɖɔɖɔ to teƒe si wofo la va anyi le xɔa me.
Wokakaa nye aba, kakaa nye Biblia-srɔ̃gbalẽwo ɖe xɔa me, eye wowɔa nye nɔƒe nyamaa.
Nyemete ŋu ɖo ŋku alesi wònɔna be woafɔ kpla le aba dzi le ŋdi eye woanɔ didim vevie be yeatso eye ŋusẽ geɖe wu nanɔ ame ŋu le ŋkekea me dzi o.
Eɖanye wole atike nam alo le ʋu ɖem alo dɔwɔnu dede ŋutilãa me alo dɔnɔa tɔtrɔ le aba dzi dzro gɔ̃ hã ye o, ele na dɔnɔdzikpɔla be wòaɖɔ ŋu ɖo vevie.
Paulo ŋlɔ tso esia ŋu be: “Vinyenyegbɔgbɔ . . . miexɔ, esi me míedo ɣli le be:Aba, Fofo!
Ŋutsua haya enumake eye wòkɔ eƒe aba hedze azɔli zɔzɔ gɔme!
Le kpɔɖeŋu me, gbeɖeka anye ƒe ene enye esia la, ahanomunɔ aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Ariel tsi aba dzi le ahamumu ta.
Metsɔ ta de nye aba te be magagbɔ nusi dze abe aɖiya yibɔ ene la o.
Esia na wòdze dzeɖoɖo gɔme kple aƒea tɔ si nɔ dɔ lém ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe eye wòtsi aba dzi.
Tsɔ wò aba, eye nàzɔ.”
Meti kpo tso nye aba dzi hetsɔ Biblia bla ɖe ali dzi, eye medo awu kpatakpata.
Míelé dɔ zi eve alo zi etɔ̃ tsi aba dzi didi.
“‘Meɖo ŋku anyi le ŋutega siwo mekpɔ esime mele nye aba dzi la me, eye mekpɔ dzɔla kɔkɔe aɖe ɖi tso dziƒo.
Nyanyuiawo ƒe nuŋlɔɖia yi edzi be: “Eye ame la ƒe lãme sẽ enumake, eye wòkɔ eƒe aba dzi hezɔ azɔli.”
Mebia wotsɔ atikewɔgbalẽ vɛ nam le nye aba dzi, eye mía kple srɔ̃nye míede asi numekuku me le eme.
Míenɔ agbe tsɛ le kɔƒenutoawo me—elektrikkaɖi menɔ anyi o, míeɖoa aba ɖe anyigba mlɔa edzi, eye míedoa sɔwo alo ɖoa tasiaɖam tsɔ zɔa mɔe.
Edzem sesĩe ale gbegbe be ɖeko memu dze aba dzi.”
Ke le fiẽ la, edo go yi ɖamlɔ eƒe aba dzi le eƒe aƒetɔ ƒe subɔviwo gbɔ, eye meyi aƒe me o.
Míada alakpa alo aba amewo hã o, ne míaƒe dɔtɔ di be míawɔe nenema hã.—Dɔwɔwɔwo 15:29; Nyaɖeɖefia 21:8.
Le ŋdi me la, meklɔa agbawo, kpea asi ɖe nuɖala la ŋu, dzraa aba 12 dzi ɖo, heɖoa kplɔ̃wo na ŋdɔnuɖuɖu.
Esi Yesu va Kapernaum la, asrafomegã aɖe va egbɔ heɖe kuku nɛ vevie+ 6 be: “Aƒetɔ, nye subɔvi le aba dzi le aƒe me le lãmetutudɔ lém, eye wòle fu kpem vevie.”
Eva hiã be Maria nasẽ ŋkume ŋutɔ hafi afɔ le aba dzi ayi eƒe gbesiagbedɔwɔnawo dzi.
Le ɣleti 18 susɔe siwo do ŋgɔ na Arne ƒe ku me la, etsi aba dzi eye wòhiã beléle ɣesiaɣi.
Ðɔkta la tsi tre ɖe nye aba gbɔ, eye danye gblɔ be: “Ðɔkta va be yeado gbe na wò.”
Tso nàɖo wò aba.”
Le nyateƒe me la, wogblɔ be aba si dzi sesẽ akpa ate ŋu adzi wò dzimedɔ ɖe edzi.
Gake Alexander bu fɔ eɖokui ale gbegbe be enɔ aba dzi ŋkeke etɔ̃ numaɖumaɖu kple numanomano.
Egiptetɔwo tsɔ gbe sia wɔa agbalẽ, aba, abala, afɔkpa, kple akro siwo mekpena o.

Wo dometɔ aɖewoe nye: ne egblɔ be yesea veve le aɖuɖɔɖɔɖɔ alo afɔdzidede me, ne dɔ ƒo ɖe eƒe nyɔnu me, ne eƒe nyɔnume wɔ abi alo fienɛ, ne edze aɖuɖɔɖɔɖɔ ɖe aba dzi gɔme kpata, ne megate ŋu ɖua nu nyuie o alo nuɖuɖu ƒe kuxi bubuwo le eŋu, ne eliɔ̃, ne ete vɔvɔ̃ le suku alo aƒea ƒe teƒe aɖewo, ɣeyiɣi siwo dzidzi ƒonɛ, ne awu ɖeɖe doa vɔvɔ̃ nɛ akpa, ne evɔ̃na be ye kple ame nyanyɛ aɖe ɖeɖeko yewoanɔ anyi, kple ne eya ŋutɔ lã eƒe ŋutinu aɖe.
Eya ta ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi: “Aba si dzi nèle la, màfɔ le edzi o, elabena àku godoo.”’”
Kuku dada ɖe aba dzi hea dzɔgbevɔ̃e vɛ
Ne ame tsitsi le aba dzi la, megate ŋu dɔa alɔ̃ yia eme o.
Esia nana wònɔa bɔbɔe na lãwo abe kadzidɔewo kple fiewo be woada aba ayi mɔ ƒe akpa kemɛ eye mahiã be woaɖi le atiawo dzi o.”
Le ŋkeke evelia ƒe zã me la, menɔ aba dzi le exa henɔ egbɔ kpɔm vaseɖe esime wòku.
Na wò aba nanye esi dzi nàmlɔ aɖe dzi ɖi.
Eye kpɔ ɖa, ŋutsuwo kɔ lãmetututɔ aɖe ɖe aba dzi vɛ, eye wodze agbagba be yewoakɔe ava afi si Yesu le ahadae ɖe eŋkume.

Le ƒe 1934 me la, wowɔ xɔdɔmeʋu si le kpokploe evɔ womaxaxa le eme o, si me pɔmpi, mlekpui kple aba le, eye wotrɔ asi le eŋu be vuvɔ nagawɔ ame le eme o la ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo ɖe Bulletin la me hefia ale si woate ŋu awɔe tsitotsito.
Le ƒe 1996 me, esi menɔ anyi ɖe egbɔ le aba dzi, nɔ avi fam le vevesese ta la, melé eƒe asi heɖe kuku nɛ ɖe nusiwo katã mewɔ ta, eye megblɔ nɛ be melɔ̃e ŋutɔ.
Ɣletiviwo zɔna le xlãƒoƒo me, eye aba kɔtoe tɔ, si nye Mawu ƒe ŋusẽtsoƒe lae yɔa wo ɖe nu.
Wowui le eya ŋutɔ ƒe aba dzi.
Eyi ɖamlɔ anyi ɖe eƒe aba dzi hetrɔ mo ɖe aga, eye wògbe nuɖuɖu.
Ne èle aba ɖom la, dze klo ɖeka ɖe aba dzi eye mègado wò abɔ evea siaa ɖe aba ƒe akpa keme o ke viã ɖe abɔ ɖeka ŋu.
Zanoah bɔbɔ nɔ aba dzi helé nye asi eye wòxlẽ Psalmo 37:25 me nyawo nam be: “Menɔ ɖevime tsã, eye azɔ metsi, ke nyemekpɔ be, wogblẽ ame dzɔdzɔe ɖi, eye viawo ɖo abologbe kpɔ o.”
Gake eɖo eŋu na wo be: “Ame si da gbe le ŋunye lae gblɔ nam be, ‘Tsɔ wò aba, eye nàzɔ.’”
Xɔ sue si me do viviti aɖee wònye, eye atsatsa ye wotsɔ ɖo aba lae.
Zi geɖe la woɖea nusiawo le Memleɖagbe ŋdi si nye ɣeyiɣi si ɖeviwo meyia suku o eye wo dzilawo hã mekpɔ fɔ le aba dzi o.
Adin Steinsaltz gblɔ be: “Sukua ƒe tatɔe nɔa zi me, enɔa zikpui alo aba tɔxɛ aɖewo dzi.
Womeɖea mɔ ame aɖeke nɔa nyɔnu siawo ƒe aba dzi alo mlɔa edzi o.
Esi woɖe asi le ŋunye tso Buchenwald ƒe ade megbe la, dɔléle na metsi aba dzi ɣleti ene sɔŋ.
Gbe ɖekaa, memu aha ale gbegbe be esi mefɔ le aba dzi le ŋufɔkea, nyemenya ale si mewɔ va ɖo aƒe me o!
Le zã aɖe me, esi dzinyelawo gawɔ dzre vevie vɔ megbe la, menɔ anyi ɖe nye aba dzi heka atam be ne meva ɖe srɔ̃ gbe ɖeka la, nyemawɔ dzre kple srɔ̃nye gbeɖe o.
Wolɔ nuwo ƒo ƒu ɖe gbe bɔbɔe dzi wòzu aba na kesetsu si ƒe dzime le abe klosalo ene.
Ke be miadze sii be ŋusẽ le Amegbetɔvi la si be wòatsɔ nu vɔ̃wo ake le anyigba dzi . . .” egblɔ na lãmetututɔa be: “Mele egblɔm na wò be, Tso nàtsɔ wò aba, eye nàyi aƒewò me.”
Mewu ami ʋeʋĩ siwo nye mire, aloe kple sinamɔn ɖe nye aba dzi.
Hafi ʋua nadze anyi la, ŋutsuawo dɔ alɔ̃ ɖe aba si woɖo ɖe simintikotokuawo dzi la dzi le ʋua ƒe megbe.

Nyemaŋlɔ gbe si nutome sue dzikpɔla aɖe do ɖa le nye aba ŋu esi menɔ dzodzom le kɔdzi afisi wona beléle tɔxɛm le be o, nenema ke nyemaŋlɔ Kristo ƒe ku ƒe Ŋkuɖodzizã si dzi mekpɔ le kɔdzixɔ ma ke me, si me mía kple dɔnɔ ene siwo tsɔ ɖe le nyateƒea me kpɔ gome le la be o.
Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu na wo be: “Ame si da gbe le ŋunye lae gblɔ nam be, ‘Tsɔ wò aba, eye nàzɔ.’”
Ne míedi be míaƒe susu nanɔ ŋute la, atiklã dzi nɔnɔ le kplɔ̃ ŋu asɔ nyuie wu aba dzi mɔmlɔ alo zikpui bɔbɔe me nɔnɔ.

Le memama 3 lia me dzodzro me la, bia nyaselawo woagblɔ nya si woate ŋu agblɔ atsɔ adze Biblia me dzeɖoɖo gɔme le nɔnɔme siwo gbɔna la dometɔ aɖewo me: (1) le nuƒleƒe, (2) le bɔs me, (3) le aƒelika aɖe si le abɔme dzram ɖo gbɔ, (4) kple dɔwɔhati le dɔwɔƒe, kple (5) sukuhati le suku.
Nyagblɔla 2:10) Salomo tu xɔwo na eɖokui, ede weingblewo, etɔ abɔwo, ewɔ tsaɖiƒevewo, kple tsitawo na eɖokui.
Zion ke eƒe abɔwo me;+ gake ame aɖeke meli afa akɔ nɛ o.

Daniel ta 2 lia gblɔ be drɔ̃ea ku ɖe legba gã aɖe si ƒe ta nye sika ŋu, eƒe akɔta kple abɔwo nye klosalo, eƒe ƒodo kple ali nye akɔbli, eƒe atawo nye gayibɔ, eye eƒe afɔwo nye gayibɔ si tsaka kple tsu.
Ƒe aɖewo do ŋgɔ la, Sabina si lé vianyɔnuvi sue eveawo ɖe eƒe abɔwo me la, tsi tsitre ɖi henɔ srɔ̃a kpɔm wòɖo bɔs xoxo aɖe yina dɔ di ge le dukɔ bubu aɖe me.
Meŋlɔ nye awua ƒe abɔwo hekpe ɖe eŋu.
Gaxɔdzikpɔlawo blae sesĩe ɖe awu me va se ɖe esime eƒe abɔwo kple afɔwo ku ɖe eŋu.
Yehowa xlɔ̃ nu Israel-vi siwo va trɔ ɖe “akunyawɔwɔ” ŋu la be: “Ne mieke miaƒe abɔwo me la, maɣla ŋkume ɖe mi.
(Luka 2:26) Dzidzɔ ka gbegbee nye si wònye na Simeon esi wòge ɖe gbedoxɔa me, eye Maria kple Yosef da vidzĩ Yesu ɖe eƒe abɔwo me!

“Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la gblɔe nye esi, ‘Mebla nu kple mia tɔgbuiwo+ le gbe si gbe mekplɔ wo tso Egipte-nyigba dzi tso kluviƒe me+ hegblɔ be: 14 “Ne ƒe adre wu enu la, mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe neɖe asi le nɔvia Hebritɔ si wodzra nɛ, eye wòsubɔe ƒe ade la ŋu; ɖe asi le eŋu wòadzo le gbɔwò.”
Fia adre siwo kplɔ Xerxes ɖo va nɔ Persia Fiaɖuƒea ƒe fiazikpui dzi le ƒe 143 siwo kplɔe ɖo me la dometɔ aɖeke meho aʋa ɖe Hela ŋu o.
Tso esime wòxɔ ƒe adre vaseɖe esime wòwu gɔmedzesuku nu la, nyɔnuvi sue sia kpea eƒe nufialawo vaa Fiaɖuƒe Akpata me ɣesiaɣi si wòawɔ dɔ le Teokrasi Subɔsubɔ Sukua me.
Ɣemaɣi ƒomea me tɔ siwo ade ame adre tsɔ nyɔnyrɔxɔxɔ ɖe tsi me ɖo kpe woƒe adzɔgbeɖeɖe na Yehowa dzii.
Ŋutsu adre siwo nye Yudatɔwo ƒe nunɔlawo ƒe tatɔ Skeva viwoe nɔ nu sia wɔm.

Woyɔa ŋkekenyui sia be Abolo Maʋamaʋã Ƒe Ŋkekenyui, eye wòdzea egɔme tso ŋkeke si kplɔ Nisan 14 lia si nye ŋkeke si dzi woɖua Ŋutitotoŋkekenyuia le ɖo la dzi, eye woɖunɛ ŋkeke adre ʋuu va se ɖe Nisan 21 lia dzi.

“Lãkplɔvi adre kple amegã enyi” siwo ŋu woƒo nu tsoe le Mixa 5:4 la tsi tre ɖi na hamemetsitsi siwo woɖo be woado ŋusẽ Mawu ƒe amewo ɖe amedzidzedze si le ŋgɔ, si ŋu nya wogblɔ ɖi la ŋu.—11/15, axa 20.
Eƒe aʋawɔla siwo ŋkɔ woŋlɔ la le ame akpe blaade vɔ eve alafa adre.
Esi wonɔ ŋutinya sia ŋlɔm la, Vladimir kple gbeƒãɖela adre bubuwo nɔ lalam be yewoaxɔ nyɔnyrɔ le gaxɔa me.
Le kpɔɖeŋu me, bu Central African Republic, si nye dukɔ si me ame 16,184, siwo nye gbeƒãɖelawo le dua me ƒe xexlẽme ƒe teƒe adre, de Kristo ƒe ku ƒe Ŋkuɖodzia le ƒe si va yi me la ŋu kpɔ.
Le ŋkeke adrelia gbea, wozɔ ƒo xlã dua zi adre.
Zadukitɔwo zã ahosi si ɖe srɔ̃ zi adre la ƒe kpɔɖeŋu tsɔ bia be: “Le tsitretsitsi la me ɖee, wo ame adre la dometɔ ka srɔ̃ wòazu mahã?”
Amesiamina wɔnuteƒe siwo kpɔa gome le magazine ma ŋɔŋlɔ me la kpɔe be Daniel ƒe nyagblɔɖi siwo ku ɖe “azã adre” ŋu la fia asi ɣeyiɣi si Mawu ɖo be Mesia Fiaɖuƒea nadze dziɖuɖu gɔme.
Mose ƒe sea gblɔ le 4 Mose 19:16 be ame sia ame si aka asi ame kuku, ameƒu alo yɔdo ŋu la, eŋu mekɔ o ŋkeke adre.
Ame siawo do ŋgɔ heva le mía lalam le Troa; 6 ke míeɖo tɔdziʋu tso Filipi le Amɔwɔ Maʋamaʋã Bolo Ŋkekenyui+ ƒe azã la megbe, eye le ŋkeke atɔ̃ me la, míeva tu wo le Troa, eye míenɔ afi ma ŋkeke adre.
ESIME Susan xɔ ƒe adre eye exɔlɔ̃ si ŋkɔe nye Al si xɔ ƒe asieke lé polio-dɔ si wɔe be woxɔ Al ɖe kɔdzi wònɔ dzitodzitomɔ̃ me kee nya geɖe nɔ Susan si ku ɖe Mawu ƒe anyinɔnɔ ŋu.
Hame adre siawo aɖi Yehowa Ðasefowo ƒe egbegbe nutome sue ƒe akpa aɖe.
Agbadɔmeŋkekenyui la nye ŋkeke adre ƒe azãɖuɖu.
Sikaŋɔtigɛ si wòbia la ƒe kpekpeme va le sekel* akpe ɖeka alafa adre, womebu atsyɔ̃ɖonu gobɛawo, togɛwo, Midian-fiawo ƒe alẽfuwu dzĩwo kple woƒe kposɔwo ƒe kɔgawo ɖe eme o.
Nyagblɔɖi si ku ɖe lãkplɔvi adre kple amegã enyi ŋu la ava eme le mɔ si lolo wu nu ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe le Yesu, “Israel ƒe dziɖula . . . ame si dzɔɣi tso tititi le gbaɖegbe ʋĩ ke” la dzidzi megbe.
Wotsia anyi hena Abolo Maʋãmaʋãwo ƒe Ŋkekenyuie si kplɔe ɖo, si xɔa ŋkeke adre, esi wobuna abe Ŋutitotoŋkekenyuiea ƒe ɣeyiɣia ƒe akpa aɖe ene la hã.
Migawɔ dɔ sesẽ aɖeke o, eye miaɖu ŋkekenyui na Yehowa ŋkeke adre sɔŋ.
“AZÃ ADRE” LA—ALEKE EƑE DIDIME LE?
Woƒe xexlẽme si nye adre fia blibodede le Mawu gbɔ.
Gbɔgbɔ la do go le ame aɖe me gake esi amea metsɔ nu nyuiwo ɖo eteƒe si tsi ƒuƒlu o la, gbɔgbɔa trɔ gbɔ kple gbɔgbɔ vɔ̃ adre bubuwo eye nɔnɔme si me amea va nɔ la vɔ̃ɖi wu tsã.
Eŋɔŋlɔ alea mefia adre teƒe eve o, abe ale si mawunyakpukpui bubuwo ɖee fia ene.
Yehowa de se na Israel-viwo be woatsrɔ̃ dukɔ adre aɖewo siwo le Kanaan-nyigba dzi la ƒe duwo ahawu wo me nɔlawo katã.
Woƒe xexlẽme si nye adre fia blibodede le Mawu gbɔ.

Ele be woaɖa adelã ƒe akpa siwo tri wòabi nyuie.
Isak lɔ̃ Esau, elabena edea adelã nu me nɛ, ke Rebeka ya lɔ̃ Yakob.
Míede se na míaƒe dɔwɔlawo be woagatsɔ tu ɖe asi o be míatsɔ axe mɔ ɖe adedada nu, eye míewɔa ɖoɖo ɖe nyilã kple koklolã ŋu na wo le asaɖa la me ale be adelã nagadzro o.
USDA kafui be woaɖu adelã kple nuɖuɖu siwo wotsɔ nyinotsi wɔe ʋɛ aɖe ko.
Kuɖa sia Kuɖa la, tɔgbuinye kple mamanye yia asi me ɖaƒlea adelã, atikutsetsewo kple amagbe siwo míazã le kwasiɖa bliboa me.
(1 Mose 3:21; 9:3) Míedi be míanɔ abe adelã ŋutasẽla Nimrod, ame si edze ƒãa be ewua lãwo ɖe dzidzɔdodonameɖokui ta ko la ene o.
Meɖe kuku, fɔ ne nàɖu nye adelã la ƒe ɖe, ne nàyram.”
Mègaɖu adelã mumu gbeɖe o.
Egblɔ be: “Kuviatɔ memea eƒe adelã o; ke veviedodo la nu xɔasi wònye na amegbetɔ.”
Eya hã ɖa nu vivi aɖe eye wòtsɔe vɛ na fofoa eye wògblɔ nɛ be: “Fofonye, meɖe kuku fɔ nàɖu viwò ƒe adelã la ƒe ɖe, ne nàyram.”
(Lododowo 12:27) Alɔgblɔdɔwɔla—“kuviatɔ”—“memea” eƒe adelã o.
Eye wògblɔ be: “Vinye, tsɔ adelã la vɛ nam maɖu ne mayra wò.”
Egblɔ be: “Kuviatɔ memea eƒe adelã o; ke veviedodo la nu xɔasi wònye na amegbetɔ.”
Le Xezekiel ƒe aboyomenɔnɔ le Babilon ƒe ƒe adelia, alo ƒe 612 D.M.Ŋ. me lɔƒo la, nyagblɔɖila la kpɔ ŋutega aɖe si me ŋutsu 70 do dzudzɔ na legbawo le Yerusalem gbedoxɔa me.
Menye dukɔa gbugbɔɖoanyi le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me koe nye nyagblɔɖi sia me vava o.

Le ɣeyiɣi aɖe megbe la, dugã si nye ƒukpo la akpɔ dzidzedze ale gbegbe be le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. ƒe nuwuwu lɔƒo la, nyagblɔɖila Zaxarya agblɔ be: “Tiro tu mɔ̃ sesẽ na eɖokui, eli kɔ klosalo gleglegle abe ke ene kple sika abe gbeɖuɖɔ le kpɔdomee ene.”—Zaxarya 9:3.
29 Azɔ nutrenu adelia ɖeɖe ɖa ɖee fia be nu ma tɔgbe adzɔ le Yehowa ƒe dzikuŋkeke si gbɔna la dzi.
Akpa vevi kae lã la ƒe ta adelia wɔ le nya si le 1 Mose 3:15 la me vava me?
Gake le keke ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me ke la, Helatɔ xexemenunyala Pythagoras tsɔ susu bui be anyigba la anye nu nogo.

4 Míese nya dodzidzɔname sia si tso Yehowa gbɔ zi adelia le Zaxarya ta 8 lia me be: “Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Agbe neɖo miaƒe asiwo me, mi amesiwo se nya siawo tso nyagblɔɖilawo nu le ŋkeke siawo me, nya, siwo wogblɔ na mi le gbesigbe woɖo Yehowa Zebaot ƒe xɔ la gɔme anyi, be woagatu gbedoxɔ la.
Biblia me nyagblɔɖi kae va eme le ŋutikɔkɔe me le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me?
Ne èxlẽ memamã enelia vaseɖe adelia vɔ la, bia nya evelia: “Yesu ƒe nyagblɔɖia ƒe akpa kae va eme le ƒe 70 M.Ŋ. me, gake nukae medzɔ ɣemaɣi o?”
Le ƒe alafa adelia do ŋgɔ na Mía Ŋɔli me la, du sia nye blema Lidia-fiaɖuƒea ƒe fiadu si dzi wodana ɖo kple kesinɔtɔ gã Fia Kroeso ƒe nɔƒe.
Womenya nu boo aɖeke tso ame ma si wogblɔ be enɔ anyi le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me la ŋu o, eye womeka ɖe ema dzi gɔ̃ hã o.
Babilon-fia Nabonido (ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ.) ŋlɔ le Sin ƒe gbedoxɔ si nɔ Harran ŋu be: “Mefa sika kple klosalo ɖe eƒe gliwo ŋu, eye mena wole dzo dam abe ɣe ene.”
Le Nyaɖeɖefia ƒe ta si do ŋgɔ me la, mawudɔla adelia kple adrelia kɔ Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoekpluwo ɖi.
22 Eye le ŋkeke adelia dzi la, wofɔ abolo teƒe eve nu,+ ame ɖeka omer eve.
Míexlẽ le ta adelia ƒe kpukpui 13 lia, le nuŋlɔɖia dzi yiyi me be: “Mawu gblɔ na Noa bena: Ŋutilãwo katã ƒe nuwuwu ɖo azɔ, elabena woƒe nu vlo wɔwɔ xɔ anyigba la dzi.”
ESIA ƑE KPƆÐEŊU: Le ƒe alafa adelia Do Ŋgɔ Na Mía Ŋɔli la, nyagblɔɖila Daniel kpɔ ŋutega aɖe si ɖe ale si Helatɔwo aɖu Medo-Persia fiaɖuƒea dzi le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe me la fia.

Esi wokɔ Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoekplu adelia ɖi vɔ la, Yohanes ka nya ta be gbɔgbɔ vɔ̃wo tsɔ woƒe nyagbɔgblɔwo ƒo “anyigba dzi fiawo kple xexeame katã ƒe fiawo” nu ƒu ɖe “Mawu Ŋusẽkatãtɔ la ƒe ŋkeke gã ma ƒe aʋawɔwɔ la” ŋu.

Nudzidze gbãtɔ dze Yehoyarib dzi; evelia dze Yedaya dzi, 8 etɔ̃lia dze Harim dzi, enelia dze Seorim dzi, 9 atɔ̃lia dze Malkiya dzi, adelia dze Miyamin dzi, 10 adrelia dze Hakoz dzi, enyilia dze Abiya+ dzi, 11 asiekelia dze Yesua dzi, ewolia dze Sekaniya dzi, 12 wuiɖekɛlia dze Eliyasib dzi, wuievelia dze Yakim dzi, 13 wuietɔ̃lia dze Hupa dzi, wuienelia dze Yesebeab dzi, 14 wuiatɔ̃lia dze Bilga dzi, wuiadelia dze Imer dzi, 15 wuiadrelia dze Hezir dzi, wuienyilia dze Hapizez dzi, 16 wuiasiekelia dze Petahiya dzi, blaevelia dze Yehezkel dzi, 17 blaeve vɔ ɖekɛlia dze Yakin dzi, blaeve vɔ evelia dze Gamul dzi, 18 blaeve vɔ etɔ̃lia dze Delaya dzi, blaeve vɔ enelia dze Maaziya dzi.
Esi gaƒoƒo adelia* ɖo la, viviti do ɖe anyigba ma katã dzi va se ɖe gaƒoƒo asiekelia*+ dzi.
Aleke Roma wɔ va zu xexemefiaɖuƒe adelia le Biblia ƒe nyagblɔɖi me, gake nukatae meva zu dzo sue la o?
Le numedzodzro aɖe megbe le klass atɔ̃lia me la, sukuviawo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ be: “Taflatse Davi, dze agbagba nàɖo klass adelia.
Eye ne ɖe woana atɔm ɖeka nalolo ɖe edzi vaseɖe esime wòakɔkɔ abe dziƒoxɔ tuɖedzi 13 ene hã la, ɖeko eƒe niuklɔs si le etome ƒe lolome anɔ abe dzekui ɖeka ene si anɔ dziƒoxɔa ƒe dzisasra adelia dzi.
Eva keke ɖe enu zu dukɔ 15 siwo ƒe anyigbawo ƒe lolome de anyigba bliboa ƒe akpa adelia kloe.
Le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me la, Daniel gblɔ dziɖula aɖe si “[ana] nudzɔdzɔxɔlawo natsa le fiaɖuƒe nyo la me” ŋu nya ɖi.
Daniel ƒe agbalẽa me nyawo fia be enye nyateƒegbalẽ si Hebri-vi nyagblɔɖila aɖe si nɔ agbe le ƒe alafa adre kple adelia D.M.Ŋ. me ŋlɔ.

Wotsɔ kpe xɔasi ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi ɖo atsyɔ̃ na dua ƒe gɔmeɖoanyi: gɔmeɖokpe gbãtɔ nye yaspis, evelia nye safir, etɔ̃lia nye kalkedon, enelia nye emerald, 20 atɔ̃lia nye sardonik, adelia nye sardis, adrelia nye krisolit, enyilia nye beril, asiekelia nye topaz, ewolia nye krisopas, wuiɖekɛlia nye hiakint, eye wuievelia nye ametist.
Nɔnɔme dodzidzɔname kple nɔnɔme bubu siwo ɖi emawo xɔ nɔƒe adelia.
Woɖo Jain-subɔsubɔ le India le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me.
Le nuwɔwɔ ƒe ŋkeke adelia dzi la, Mawu wɔ ame.
Adelia—si nye Roma Fiaɖuƒea—ganɔ dzi ɖum.
Nyati siawo dzro Zakariya ƒe ŋutega adelia, adrelia kple enyilia me.
Yehowa wɔ Adam eye emegbe wòwɔ Xawa wonye eƒe nuwɔwɔŋkeke adelia ƒe taƒoƒo—wonye nuwɔwɔ siwo de ŋgɔ boo wu tɔmelãwo, xeviwo, kple lãwo!

Le Gregory si tso Tours ƒe blemaŋutinya si wòŋlɔ le ƒe alafa adelia M.Ŋ. me ƒe nya nu la, aʋa si wowɔ le Tolbiac (Zülpich, Germany) kple Alemanni-toa le ƒe 496 M.Ŋ. me mee Clovis do ŋugbe le be ne Clotilda ƒe Mawu na yeɖu aʋaa dzi la, yeaɖe asi le trɔ̃subɔsubɔ ŋu.
Le nyateƒe me, le ƒe siawo me la, nuŋɔŋlɔɖeŋuti va xɔ nɔƒe adelia le dɔwɔƒe sue siwo le dzidzim ɖe edzi kabakaba wu le United States la dome.
Le Asa ƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ adelia me la, Israel-fia Baasa+ ho ɖe Yuda ŋu, eye wòkeke* Rama+ ɖe nu, ne wòaxe mɔ be ame aɖeke nagado alo ava Yuda-fia Asa gbɔ o.
Betel ƒomea me tɔ atɔ̃lia si va kpe ɖe wo ŋu eteƒe medidi o lae nye Giuseppe Tubini, eye nyee nye ame adelia.
Le ƒe alafa adelia le Kristotɔwo Ŋɔli la, Arabtɔ siwo nɔ nutoa me la tɔ dzo Timgad ale du blibo la fiã eye enu yi keŋkeŋ hena ƒe 1,000 sɔŋ.
Kpedzinuŋlɔɖiwo ƒo nu tso ɖekawɔwɔ si nɔ amesiawo kple Minitɔwo dome esime wotsi tre ɖe Asiriatɔwo ŋu le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ.
Tso ƒe alafa adelia vaseɖe ewolia M.Ŋ. me la, woyɔ agbalẽŋlɔla siawo be Masoratɔwo.
Wowu gbedoxɔa tutu nu le ƒe 515 D.M.Ŋ. me, le Dario I ƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe ƒe adelia me.—Ezra 6:1, 15.
Le ŋkeke adelia dzi la, woafɔ ‘nuɖuɖua ɖe ŋkeke eve nu,’ elabena le ŋkeke adrelia dzi la, ɖeke madza o.
Le ƒe 2011 me la, etrɔ yi France be yeawɔ dɔ akpɔ ga vi aɖe atsɔ akpɔ ye ɖokui dzi ƒe ɖeka le Afrika (esiae anye zi adelia si wòzɔ mɔ va).
Ema megbe kpuie la, nɔnɔme aɖe do mo ɖa le Kristotɔ amesiaminawo dome le anyigba dzi si ɖi Yudatɔ siwo nɔ aboyo me le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me la tɔ le go geɖe me.
Míena ŋkɔe be míaƒe kpekpe adelia.
Le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. ƒe nuwuwu lɔƒo la, wodoe ɖe dzi wòzu mawu gã si wosubɔna.
Yudatɔ nuteƒewɔla siwo nɔ anyi le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. ada akpe ɖe Yesaya ƒe nyagblɔɖia ta godoo, eye esɔsrɔ̃ faa akɔ na mí amesiwo li egbea.
(Yohanes 17:16) Le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me la, ewɔ ɖe ŋugbe si wòdo to Yeremya dzi la dzi eye wòna “ŋutifafa kple nyateƒe” eƒe dukɔ tɔxɛ la esime wògakplɔ wo va wo denyigba dzi.

(Nyaɖeɖefia 19:11-16, 19-21) Nusi apostolo Petro gblɔ esime wònɔ mɔ kpɔm na nudzɔdzɔ siwo nutrenu adelia ɖeɖe ɖa ɖe fia la ɖo kpe esia dzi: “[Wodzra] fifi dziƒo kple anyigba la ɖo, eye woda wo ɖi na dzo, vaseɖe ame mavɔ̃mawuwo ƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ kple gbegblẽ ƒe ŋkeke la dzi.”
Egblɔ nu si dzɔ le ɣleti si nye Marheshvan ƒe ŋkeke gbãtɔ dzi, le Yudatɔwo ƒe aglãdzedze ɖe Roma ŋu ƒe ƒe adelia me.
Helatɔ akɔntanyala xɔŋkɔ Pythagoras si nɔ anyi le ƒe alafa adelia D.M.Ŋ. me gblɔ be luʋɔ mekuna o eye egena ɖe nu bubu me le ku me.
Wotrɔ Helatɔwo ƒe Artemis, nyɔnu adela la wòzu Diana eye woawo ŋutɔwo ƒe mawu siwo ɖi Egiptetɔwo ƒe Isis hã le wo si.
Enye Adela, si nye nɔvinyɔnu tsitsi aɖe, ƒe didi vevie be yeazã ɣeyiɣi geɖe ɖe gbeƒãɖeɖedɔa ŋu.
Eva zu adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tsitre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.
Esi ŋutsuviawo tsi la, Esau va zu adela bibi,+ eye wòlɔ̃a gbe me nɔnɔ, ke Yakob ya nye ame fafa,* eye wòlɔ̃a agbadɔ me nɔnɔ.
Ne adela aɖewo di be yewoana lãwo nado go tso afi siwo wobe ɖo la, wotɔa dzo avea ƒe akpa aɖe, eye wonɔa lãwo lém ne wole sisim.
Ame sia enye adela kalẽtɔ le [tsitretsitsi ɖe] Yehowa [ŋu] me.”
Togbɔ be womegblɔ be etsrɔ̃ lã ƒomevi aɖeke ɖa keŋ o hã la, enye adela kalẽtɔ.—Mose I, 10:9.
Zi geɖe la, adela ƒe mɔ̃ nyea kamɔ̃e si wosa kɔe eye wòmiaa ve na lã alo ka si lea afɔ na lã.
Menye eƒe taɖodzinue nye be yeawu wo abe ale si adela aɖe awu lã si wòlé la ene o.
Zi geɖe la, woblaa lã evea ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu be woawɔ avu vaseɖe esime ɖeka naku, emegbe adela wua evelia.
Ehiã kokoko be avũ nuteƒewɔla nanɔ adela ɖesiaɖe si.
Yehowa gblɔ kpee be ne ame aɖe, abe adela alo agbledela ene, wu lã aɖe be yeaɖu la, ele be wòaɖuɖu eƒe ʋu ɖe anyigba ahaxe ke ɖe edzi.
Ame aɖe si xɔ ŋkɔ le blemaɣeyiɣi ma mee nye Nimrod, dutsola aɖe si ganye ‘adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.’
Adela kple tɔƒodela aɖewo wua lãwo ɖe modzakaɖeɖe, vivisese na adedada alo lãwo wuwu ko ta.
Adela lae nye Esau, eye ŋutsuvi, si le alẽawo dzi kpɔm lae nye Yakob.
Lã wɔadãwo ƒe ŋusẽ tso dzika ƒo na adela kple lãkplɔla tsatsalawo.
Amesiwo gadoa Khoisan-gbea egbea dometɔ aɖewoe nye Damara-tɔ yibɔwo, Namatɔ amevime siwo ƒe agbalẽ me klẽ, kple Avemenɔla adela xɔŋkɔwo.
Le Nicaragua afi sia la, àkpɔ woŋlɔ ʋukula siwo kua ʋu anyratɔe la ƒe megbeŋkɔwo ɖe woƒe ʋuwo ƒe ŋgɔgbehuhɔ̃eawo dzi, woƒe ɖewoe nye: Dziɖula, Dziɖegbe (Akekle), Ʋɔ, alo Adela.
Wo fofo Isak lɔ̃ Esau vevie ŋutɔ, elabena enye adela nyui aɖe, eye wòtsɔa nuɖuɖu vaa aƒemee na ƒomea.
Biblia me nuŋlɔɖi si le Mose ƒe Agbalẽ Gbãtɔ ƒo nu tso aglãdzela Nimrod ŋu, adela si nɔ anyi ƒe 4,000 kple vɔ enye sia.
Nu kae “ɖɔkplɔla geɖewo” kple “adela geɖewo,” siwo Yehowa aɖo ɖa la ate ŋu afia?
Emegbe madɔ adela geɖewo ɖa,
Mose ƒe agbalẽ Gbãtɔ ta 10 yɔe be “adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.”

Le Noa ƒe Tsiɖɔɖɔa megbe la, Babilon ye nye afisi ame vɔ̃ɖi Nimrod si nye “adela kalẽtɔ le Yehowa ƒe ŋku me” la dze du aɖe si nye fiaɖuƒe la tsotso gɔme le, eye anɔ eme be enye mawusubɔsubɔxɔ si kɔ ɖatɔ dziƒo.
(Yohanes I, 3:10-12) Nimrod nye amesi ƒe ŋkɔ gɔ̃ hã ɖee fia be aglãdzelae wònye eye eva zu adela kalẽtɔ kple dziɖula si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.
Adela zãa mɔ̃gbɔɖonu ƒomevi vovovowo tsɔ léa lã ƒomevi vovovowo.
Wò afɔ netsɔ nàɖe ɖokuiwò le esi me abe sãde tso adela si me ene,

Le etenuŋɔŋlɔ me la, Keil yɔ nya tso nya si wògblɔ be ŋutinyaŋlɔla Jacob Perizonius ŋlɔ me be: “Mexɔe se be ŋutsu sia [Nimrod], nye adela sẽŋuta si etɔwo ƒo xlãe, be wòade aglãdzedze ame mamlɛawo me, nya si wògblɔna gagblɔna, si mevɔna le enu o ye nye ‘nimrod, nimrod,’ si fia be, ‘Mídze aglã!
Biblia ƒo nu tso eŋuti be enye ‘adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu’—enye Da la ƒe dzidzimevia ƒe akpa aɖe vavã.
Anɔ ƒe 4,000 enye si va yi le Noa ŋɔli ƒe Tsiɖɔɖɔa megbe la, Satana tia Nimrod, si nye ‘adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.’
Ŋusẽ si wobu be ele saɖaganyo si wɔe be adela sẽŋutawo de etsrɔ̃ ge kloe.
Noa viŋutsu etɔ̃awo va zu amesiwo me amegbetɔƒomea dzɔ tso, gake eƒe tɔgbuitɔgbuiyɔvi Nimrod va zu ‘adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ŋu.’
Le ƒe 1867 me la, adela kple anyigbayeyedila Adam Renders va ke ɖe kpexɔ gbagbã gbogbo aɖe siwo xɔ teƒe si ade agbleka (acre) 1,800 kple edzivɔ ŋu.
Le adela bibiwo kple agbatetsɔla 600 zazã me la, ewu lã 500 kple edzivɔ heɖe woƒe agbalẽ tsɔ yi aƒee.
Eye abe alesi adela zãa mɔ̃gbɔɖonu hamehame tsɔ blea lãwoe ene la, nenema ke gbɔgbɔ vɔ̃ɖiwo hã zãa gbɔgbɔyɔyɔ ƒomevi vovovo tsɔ blea amewo nu hekpɔa ŋusẽ ɖe wo dzii.
Esia tae wogblɔna be: “Abe Nimrod, adela kalẽtɔ si tsi tsitre ɖe Yehowa ŋu ene.”
Asinudɔwɔwɔ si wokpɔ le teƒe evea siaa enye ŋutsu aɖe, si tsi tre ɖi na mawu aɖe, si woɖɔ lãdzokuku na eye lãwo ƒo xlãe, si wobe anye Nimrod, “adela kalẽtɔ,” la.
Lã wɔadãwo ƒe ŋusẽ tso dzika ƒo na adela kple lãkplɔla tsatsalawo.
Ɣemaɣi lɔƒo ke la, adela nyanyɛ bubu aɖe hã nɔ anyi, si ŋkɔe nye Edward, si nye Wales-fiavi.

Abe alesi ko adela zãna mɔ̃gbɔɖonu tsɔ léa lãwo ene la, Satana zãna nuwo abe etsɔmegbɔgblɔɖi, ɣletivimefakaka, goloɖoɖo, adzewɔwɔ, asiƒomefakaka, kple akunyawɔwɔ tsɔ kpɔa ŋusẽ ɖe amewo dzi le xexeame godoo.—Mose III, 19:31; Psalmo 119:110.
Dzatanɔwoe wɔa adedada la ƒe akpa 90 le alafa me, gake enuenu la, atsuawoe ɖua akpa gãtɔ ne eɖo eɖuɖu dzi.
Aleke wòle be Kristotɔ nabu adedada kple tɔƒodede?

Ramiro, Roberto, kple ame bubu geɖe siwo le abe woawo ene le kutri kum be woakpɔ anyigba xɔdzo dzi vewo ta tso dukɔwo dome sitsatsa, amewo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ fũ, lãlélawo, adedada kple atitsotso manɔsenu ŋuti kuxiwo si me.
(Mose I, 10:9, NW) Egbea hã la, dzidzɔdodo ɖe adedada kple lãwuwu ŋu ate ŋu anyɔ ɖe ame aɖewo me bɔbɔe.
Woyɔ nuwɔna vovovo 39 be wonye dɔwɔwɔ, siwo dometɔ aɖewo ku ɖe nuŋeŋe alo adedada ŋu.
Míede se na míaƒe dɔwɔlawo be woagatsɔ tu ɖe asi o be míatsɔ axe mɔ ɖe adedada nu, eye míewɔa ɖoɖo ɖe nyilã kple koklolã ŋu na wo le asaɖa la me ale be adelã nagadzro o.
Ðe nye agbenɔnɔ ɖenɛ fiana be dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ le adedada alo lãɖeɖe me ŋu nu koe menɔa agbe ɖoa, alo ɖee wòɖenɛ fiana kɔte be Mawu ƒe subɔlae menyea?
Ðevi sue siawo nɔa dzila evea siaa ŋu le afisiafi si woyina kple ne wole nusianu wɔm, eɖanye le dɔwɔwɔ, adedada, alo ɣeɖuɖu me o.
Adela kple tɔƒodela aɖewo wua lãwo ɖe modzakaɖeɖe, vivisese na adedada alo lãwo wuwu ko ta.
Aleke wòle be Kristotɔ nabu adedada kple tɔƒodede?
Abe alesi wogblɔe le The Asian Age me ene la, amegbetɔ ƒe atitsotso kple adedada manɔsenu kpakple nu bubuwoe le nu gblẽm le numiemieawo kple wo nɔƒea ŋu.
Latingbe me nuŋɔŋlɔ si wokpɔ le takpeƒe aɖe xlẽ be: “Adedada, tsilele, fefe, nukokoe —Agbea katã koe nye esia!”
Sikagba si fia adedada ƒe nuwɔna

Ke hã, naneke meɖee fia be wotsɔa lãɖeɖe alo adedada ƒoa adegbee alo be woyia ade gbe alo dea tɔ ƒo be yewoatsɔ aʋli ho alo atsɔ aɖe yewoƒe kalẽwɔwɔ afia ame bubuwo, alo ɖe dzidzɔ si woakpɔ le lãawo didi, keke ɖe wo ŋu, kple wo wuwu me la ko ta o.—Psalmo 11:5; Galatiatɔwo 5:26.
Ne ame aɖe wu axɔ̃ le Sabat dzi la, ɖe woabui be enye adedada?
Biblia mede se ɖe adedada alo tɔƒodede nu o.
Gbɔlɛ̃ kple sisiblisi siwo tsa le Alps-towo dzi la vɔ le adedada yakayaka ta.
Ahiã be ame aɖewo naɖe mɔ Mawu ƒe dzidzenuwo nakpɔ ŋusẽ ɖe woƒe nuŋububu dzi hafi Yehowa ƒe nukpɔsusu le adedada kple tɔƒodede ŋu nasu wo si.
Dzinyelawo fia adedada kple tɔƒodede mí.
Zi geɖe la, dzatanɔwoe dzea wɔnawo abe dzodzo le ŋdɔgbe ayi fafɛƒe alo adedada ene gɔme.
Esau fofo kafunɛ geɖe elabena enye ‘amesi nya adedada, eye wòlɔ̃a gbe me nɔnɔ.’
Mefia be esi woɖe mɔ be woaɖu lã ta ko la, mɔ li be woanɔ lãʋu kɔm ɖi madzemadzee le esi adedada dzɔa dzi na ame ta alo woawui atsɔ aɖe kalẽwɔwɔ afia o.
Ðe nye susu kple dzeɖoɖo katã kuna ɖe adedada alo tɔƒodede ŋua?
Le kpɔɖeŋu me, wozã aʋako siwo womlã le adedada me.
Abɔ me nɔnɔ dzroa amewo le afisiafi hekpe ɖe dukɔ siwo nɔ agbe ɖe nuɖuɖufɔfɔ kple adedada ŋu siwo nɔ “dzɔdzɔmebɔwo”—avekɔewo, avetsuwo, kple dzogbewo—me kura hã.
Adedada menye nu yeye o.

(Mateo 6:33) Gakpe ɖe eŋu la, Kristotɔwo wɔna ɖe “Kaisaro” ƒe se siwo ku ɖe adedada kple tɔƒodede ŋu la dzi, ne dziɖuɖu hea to na seawo dzi dalawo loo, alo mehea to na wo o gɔ̃ hã.—Mateo 22:21; Romatɔwo 13:1.
Tsatsa kple adedada ye nye woƒe agbenɔnɔ, eye naneke mete ŋu trɔa wo o.
Ate ŋu adzɔ be ame siwo kpɔa woƒe nuɖuɖu tso adedada alo tɔƒodede me la dometɔ aɖewo nase le wo ɖokui me be yewoate ŋu agblẽ Kristotɔwo ƒe agbanɔamedziwo ɖi faa ne adedaɣi alo tɔƒodeɣi ɖo.
Klosalonutula siwo nɔ Efeso la kpɔ viɖe geɖe tso “klosalo tsɔtsɔ wɔ Artemis ƒe trɔ̃xɔwo” me. Efesotɔwo bua Artemis sia be enye adedada, fufɔfɔ, kpakple vidzidzi ƒe mawunɔ si kpɔa yewo ta.
Adela kple tɔƒodela aɖewo wua lãwo ɖe modzakaɖeɖe, vivisese na adedada alo lãwo wuwu ko ta.
Ðe nudzɔdzɔ sia fia be mele be míano nu muame ƒomevi aɖeke hafi ade Kristotɔwo ƒe kpekpewo oa?
Egblɔ nam be nɔviŋutsu siwo yele dɔ wɔm kple la dometɔ ɖeka ade Fiaɖuƒe Subɔsubɔ Sukua ɣleti ɖeka, eye emegbe woaɖoe ɖe Subɔsubɔ Dɔdzikpɔƒea.
Eyɔ xɔ si me Yesu Kristo ƒe nusrɔ̃la siwo ade ame 120 ƒo ƒu ɖo la taŋtaŋ.
Egblɔ le eƒe mɔɖeɖedɔa wɔwɔ ŋu be: “Nyemagate ŋu akpɔ nu bubu aɖeke si wɔwɔ ade esia nu o.
Ele be míado amewo ƒe nyawo kple nuwɔnawo hã akpɔ hafi axɔ wo ade eme.
Migadze mawu bubuwo yome, be miasubɔ wo, ade ta agu na wo ahatsɔ miaƒe asinudɔwɔwɔ ado dziku nam o; ne menye nenema o la, mahe gbegblẽ ava mia dzi.’

Ne dodokpɔ aɖe dze ŋgɔ mí eye edze abe ɖe wòsesẽ ŋutɔ ene la, ŋkuɖoɖo dodokpɔ sesẽ si dze ŋgɔ Abraham esime wobia tso esi be wòatsɔ via Isak asa vɔe dzi ade dzi ƒo na mí vavã be míagana ta le xɔse ƒe dodokpɔa me o.
Enye nyateƒe be eya ame si gblɔ be “tɔnyee nye klosalo, eye tɔnyee nye sika” la mehiã míaƒe gakpekpeɖeŋu hafi wòate ŋu awɔ eƒe dɔa ade goe o.
(Mateo 5: 3, 20; Luka 7:28) Womeɖoe be woaxɔ ameƒomea me tɔ gbogbo aɖewo ade dziɖuha sia me o.
Míagate ŋu ade dzesii be Yesu lɔ̃ faa fia nu nyɔnu, eye le go sia me la, nyɔnua le ŋutsu aɖe si menye srɔ̃a o gbɔ.
Afima ƒe ayiku me kpe ƒe lolome le mamã dedie nu nye sentimeta eve vaseɖe etɔ̃ [si ade inch ɖeka], gake wònye sentimeta ɖeka [mede inch afã o] le Europa kple United States.
Woate ŋu adzro tsia wòanɔ gbɔgblɔe le tsilégbaa me, woakɔ nyɔnyrɔxɔlaa ɖɔɖɔɖɔ ade tsia me vivivi, eye ne wòɖe dzi ɖi le tsia me ko la, woate ŋu anyrɔe keŋkeŋ azɔ.
Woaɖo ŋku nu si ta wòhiã be nàdo vevie nu la dzi na wò, woafia ale si nàbi ɖe edzi le wò “nufiafiaɖaŋu” me la wò, eye woagblɔ ale si ame geɖe le to ɖom Fiaɖuƒegbedasiae atsɔ ade dzi ƒo na wò.
Ale si gbegbe amewo hiã tsi si woahe ade woƒe agblewo le nuto mawo me la wɔe be wole tɔsisi gãwo kple suewo, siwo me tsiwo va kɔna ɖe ta la me heléa taa ɖe te la me tsiwo hem wole miemiem.
Gake be sukua naɖe vi gbogbotɔ la, ele be nàŋlɔ ŋkɔ ɖe eme, ade kpekpea ɣesiaɣi eye nàtsɔ wò dɔdasiwo nu vevii.
Wo dometɔ siwo ade 2,000 ku eye ɖe wowu amesiawo dometɔ siwo wu 350.

Àte ŋu atsɔ susu akpɔ alesi gbegbe wòwɔ nukui na nɔvi siwo le nyateƒea me ƒe geɖe heganye dzidzɔ na wo esime wokplɔ wo ɖi tsae le teƒe dzeani sia si le abe abɔ ene, si ƒe lolome ade meta 69,000 le laa?
Aleke haxɔsetɔwo ate ŋu ade dzi ƒo na mí geɖee?
Ƒe ade megbe la, Beatrice va zu srɔ̃nye.
Elabena wò ɖeka hɔ̃ koe le kɔkɔe; elabena dukɔwo katã woava ade ta agu le ŋkuwò me; elabena woɖe wò nu dzɔdzɔe wɔwɔwo ɖe go fia.”
Nu kae wòfia be “woatsɔ ŋutsu [vɔ̃ɖi la] ade asi na Satana, hena ŋutilã ƒe nɔnɔme sia ɖeɖe ɖa, bene woakpɔ hamea ƒe gbɔgbɔ la ta”?
Aleke nàtsɔe ade dɔwɔwɔ mee le nuwɔwɔ ɖe ame tsitsiwo ŋu me?

Eyata togbɔ be ade mia dzi wu be miawɔ nu ɖe mia nɔewo ŋu le dɔmenyo kple bubu me hã la, ɖeko kaƒoƒo na mia nɔewo edziedzi alo mia nɔewo gbɔ nɔnɔ fũ le hadomenuwɔnawo me agadzi eƒe blanuilélea ɖe edzi.
Eye aʋala ade li na nu gbagbe eneawo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe; ŋkuwo yɔ aʋalawo ŋuti kple wo me fũu.

Esi nɔviŋutsu aɖe kple eƒe ŋutilã me nɔvinyɔnu se nuƒo aɖe le nutome sue takpekpe aɖe me megbe la, wode dzesii be ehiã be yewoawɔ tɔtrɔ aɖewo le alesi yewowɔa nu kple yewo dada si nɔ teƒe bubu si woɖe le hamea me ƒe ade enye ma la ŋu.
Nyemetea ŋu wɔa nye abɔwo kple afɔwo ŋu dɔ nyuie o.
Herodotus ŋlɔ be: “Wolãa woƒe towo ƒe akpa aɖe, lũa ta, sia woƒe abɔwo, ŋgonu kple ŋɔti, hetsɔa dawo ŋɔa woƒe miabɔwo.”
Esi wònye be Jairo ƒe abɔwo kple afɔwo me hena hetrona ta la, ewɔe be eƒe ƒuwo glɔ̃.
Roma-dugã me tɔwo tso abɔwo kpe ɖe woƒe aƒewo ŋu le du si xaxa la me.
Kuxi eve bubu, siwo ƒoa ƒu dona ɣeaɖewoɣi la, kpɔa ŋusẽ ɖe abɔwo kple atawo dzi si nana ame tsia zãdomadɔlɔ̃e edziedzi.

Agbemedɔwo abe xɔtutu, abɔwo tsotso, kple hadzidzi, kpakple agbeɖuɖu vivivo siaa nye “dagbadagba ɖe ya me,” elabena womenaa taɖodzinu gobi aɖeke nɔa agbe ŋu loo alo hea dzidzɔ si nɔa anyi didina vɛ o.
Hakpanyaŋlɔla aɖe ŋlɔ bena: “Wò abɔwo le kpuie akpa be nàda kɔ kple Mawu.”
Ameɖiƒe aɖewo siwo le England kple United States gblẽ abɔwo alo seƒoƒobɔ aɖewo ɖi be woahlẽ dzofiwo ɖe afima.

Xeŋutinunyalawo gblɔ be nusia dze egɔme ƒe ʋee aɖewo siwo va yi esi akpaviãwo va sɔ gbɔ akpa ɖe Tokyo ƒe abɔwo me kple gbedoxɔ kpowo dzi ale gbegbe be wòva hiã be akpaviãwo nayi aɖawɔ atɔ ɖe teƒe bubuwo.
Abɔwo kple modzakaɖebɔwo nɔ blema Israel-viwo hã si.
Ðewohĩ alesi Egipte dze anii—eƒe piramid gãwo, gbedoxɔ kɔkɔwo, kple eƒe aƒe gã siwo ŋu abɔwo, atikutsetsebɔwo, kple ta suewo le—la lé dzi na “ƒuta sia” nɔlawo.
Esi ƒe ewo vi aɖe mete ŋu xe bɔl si woda nɛ o la, bɔlƒoƒofiala xlãe ɖe anyi, eye eƒe abɔwo ŋe.
Eye ne Mose ƒe abɔwo le dzi la, Israel-viwo nɔa aʋa dzi ɖum, gake ne eɖiɖi eƒe abɔwo ko la, Amalektɔwo nɔa aʋa dzi ɖum.
Wolɔ̃a abɔwo le xexeame katã.

Salomo do gbe ɖa na Mawu be: “[Ne] ame aɖe alo Israel-dukɔ blibo la dze si eƒe fuɖename kple veve la, eye wòke eƒe abɔwo me ɖo ɖe xɔ sia dzi la, ekema nasee le nɔwòƒe le dziƒo, eye natsɔe ake, eye naɖo eteƒe na amesiame le eƒe zɔzɔmewo katã nu, abe alesi nènya eƒe dzii ene, elabena wò ɖeka koe nya amegbetɔviwo ƒe dzi.”—Kronika II, 6:29, 30.
“Oo, wò, ame si nɔa abɔwo me
Nusrɔ̃laa anɔ ŋku lém ɖe ale si eƒe nufialaa tɔ ɖi, ale si wòtrɔ eƒe abɔwo, kple ale si wòɖo eƒe asibidɛwo daka la dzii ŋu.
Ne azã adre la wu enu la, Mawu aɖo fia yeye si anɔ eteƒe la zi dzi —gake dziƒoe wòaɖo fia sia ya le.

Ame siwo tso nunɔlawo domee nye: Yedaya, Yehoyarib, Yakin,+ 11 Azariya, ame si nye Hilkiya vi, Mesulam vi, Zadok vi, Merayot vi, Ahitub vi, ame si nye ŋgɔxɔla le Mawu vavã la ƒe aƒe* la me, 12 Adaya, Yeroham vi, Pashur vi, Malkiya vi; Maasai, Adiel vi, ame si nye Yahzera vi, Mesulam vi, Mesilemit vi, Imer vi, 13 kple wo nɔvi siwo nye tatɔwo le wo fofowo ƒe aƒekɔwo nu; wole ame akpe ɖeka alafa adre blaade, eye wonye ŋutsu sesẽ siwo ate ŋu awɔ Mawu vavã la ƒe aƒe la ŋuti subɔsubɔdɔ la.
(Yesaya 10:5; Nyaɖeɖefia 18:2-8) “Ameƒoti” ma anye dukɔ siwo le Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo me—habɔbɔ si woɖɔ le Nyaɖeɖefia me be enye lã wɔadã dzẽ si ta adre kple dzo ewo li nɛ la.—Nyaɖeɖefia 17:3, 15-17.
Egblɔ be: “Ƒe adre ye nye esi va yi la, srɔ̃nye ku eye ɣeaɖewoɣi la, vevesesea wua gbɔgblɔ.
Esi azigolomekansa ɖe fu na Jeannie dada wu ƒe ɖeka la, eku esi Jeannie xɔ ƒe adre pɛ ko.
Wogblɔ hã be anyo be woazã keklẽŋusẽ ƒe dɔdada kwasiɖa adre.
Egena ɖe ʋutoƒewo le sɛkɛnd adre me—si tsɔna wu abidodo ɖe ʋuka me tẽ gɔ̃ hã.
“‘Ke ne nu siawo katã tu mi gake mieɖo tom o la, ekema mahe to na mi ɖe edzi zi gbɔ zi adre ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ̃wo nu.
Lã wɔadã si ta adre li na la do tso atsiaƒu me (1-10)
Mose gblɔ tame si Yehowa ɖo be yeana Israel naɖu Kanaantɔwo ƒe du sesẽ adre siwo le Ŋugbedodonyigbaa dzi la dzi na wo.
Kaka Gianna si nye fugboe le dadaa ƒe dɔme naxɔ ɣleti adre kple afã la, eƒe ŋutinuwo katã do nyuie xoxo.
(Nyaɖeɖefia 1:10, 12; 4:1; 6:1) Woɖe ŋutega sia fia le ƒe alafa gbãtɔ ƒe nɔnɔme me, esi me woɖo gbedasiwo ɖe hame adre siwo nɔ anyi le Yohanes ŋɔli la le.
Wozãa xexlẽdzesi adre le Ŋɔŋlɔawo me tsɔ fiaa blibonyenye zi geɖe.
Akaɖigbɛ adre le akaɖitia dzi,+ eye alɔ adre siwo me to le la tso agba goboe la me ɖo akaɖigbɛ ɖe sia ɖe me.
Ame aɖewo ƒo nya ta be ele be woado ʋu kpɔ le dodokpɔ vovovo adre teti me.
Eyata be woase nusi xexlẽdzesiwo fia gɔme la fia be woatsɔ gɔmeseseŋku akpɔe vavã—le kpɔɖeŋu me ne wobe woade dzesi vovototo si le ade kple adre dome.
Ena magazine 31 kple agbalẽ gbadza 15, exɔ ame adre ƒe ŋkɔ kple woƒe adrɛswo, eye wòdze aƒeme Biblia nusɔsrɔ̃ eve gɔme!
Ebɔbɔ nɔ lã wɔadã dzĩ dziŋɔ aɖe si ta adre kple dzo ewo li na la dzi.—Nyaɖeɖefia 17:1-6; 18:5.
Be míaƒo asa na gbɔgbɔ sia ƒomevi la, míate ŋu aɖo ŋku edzi be Biblia ɖɔ Yesu be “ɣletivi adre le eƒe nuɖusi me.”
Akpe geɖe na mi le dɔ nyui si wɔm miele la ta.—Pamela, ƒe adre.

“Wobu akɔnta be kaka ƒe 2020 naɖo la, dɔmaxɔleameŋuwo awu ame adre le ame ewo ɖesiaɖe si aku le nuto madeŋgɔwo me la dome, togbɔ be akɔntabubua mede esia ƒe afã egbea o hã.” —“The Global Burden of Disease,” Harvard Yunivɛsiti Gbalẽtaƒe, 1996.
(Mose IV, 14:34; Xezekiel 4:6) Eyata esiae nye “azã adre” ƒe didime—Trɔ̃subɔlawo ƒe Ɣeyiɣi la.
Dzomeŋɔli xɔdzotɔ kekeake adre dometɔ ade va le ƒe 1980 ƒe ƒeawo me tso esime wodze yame ƒe nɔnɔmewo ŋɔŋlɔ ɖi gɔme abe ƒe 150 ene enye sia.
Ele bɔbɔe be tsinyegoe me kansa nadze ŋutsu siwo dɔlélea le woƒe ƒometɔ aɖe ŋu la dzi wu.
Le numedzodzroa me la, nɔ ŋugble dem tso nu si tae nusɔsrɔ̃a aɖe vi na Biblia nusrɔ̃viwo ŋu.
Etso dzi blibo me lɔ̃ ɖe lododo aɖe me nyawo dzi be: “Yehowa ƒe yayra wɔa ame kesinɔtɔ agbagba madzemadzee.”—Lododowo 10:22.
Etea tɔ ɖe edzi be manɔ boules dam kplii (si nye Franseawo ƒe fefe aɖe) togbɔ be fefe ma medoa dzidzɔ nam tututu o hã.
Sɔhɛ Ðasefo aɖe gblɔ be: “Menya sɔhɛ aɖewo siwo ɖoa gbe ɖi kple dzimaxɔsetɔwo.
ee Nenemae nyatakaka aɖe si tso Ireland gblɔ le nɔnɔme si me xexeame le ŋu.
Protestant-bisiɔp aɖe ŋlɔ na eƒe osɔfowo be, ‘Mawue dɔ [Hitler] ɖo ɖe mí.’

Eye togbɔ be woƒe avɔgbadɔwɔwɔdɔa nye dɔ tsɛ si tea ɖeɖi ame ŋu hã la, edzɔ dzi na wo be yewoawɔ dɔ “zã kple keli” atsɔ ado Mawu ƒe nuwo ɖe ŋgɔe—abe alesi egbe Kristotɔ geɖe wɔa ɣeyiɣi aɖe ƒe dɔ alo esiwo nɔa anyi ɣeaɖeɣi ko le ƒea me ene bene woazã ɣeyiɣi si susɔ na wo ƒe akpa gãtɔ atsɔ akpe ɖe amewo ŋu ne woase nyanyuia.—Tesalonikatɔwo I, 2:9; Mateo 24:14; Timoteo I, 6:6.
Ale Satana dzo le Yehowa ŋkume, eye wòna ƒoƒoe*+ vɔ̃ɖi aɖe te Hiob tso eƒe afɔƒome va se ɖe eƒe dzodome.
Wɔla la ɖe mɔ na Mose be wòbe ɖe Sinai-toa ƒe akpa aɖe vaseɖe esime ‘Wòtso eme yi.’
Ènya ame aɖe si dzudzɔ gbedzidedea?
Biblia ŋuti nunyala aɖe gblɔe be, ‘Mawu ƒe nɔnɔme kpɔa ŋusẽ ɖe amewo ƒe susu dzi woxɔa edzi sena.’
Ame aɖe si ŋlɔ agbalẽ tso ŋugbledede ŋu gblɔ be: “Ele be susua me nanɔ ƒuƒlu hafi nàte ŋu abu tame nyuie.”
Ne ame aɖe tsɔ nuŋlɔtsi sia ŋlɔ nu vɔ teti la, ate ŋu atsɔ akutsa si wode tsi me atutu nuŋɔŋlɔa ɖa.
Mía ƒeme va zu amedzroxɔƒe tɔgbe aɖe na subɔla mɔzɔlawo.
Mawu ŋutɔ ɖo Yesu, Nazaretetɔ la, ŋusẽnɔƒe gã aɖe.

Esi nɔviŋutsu aɖe kple eƒe ŋutilã me nɔvinyɔnu se nuƒo aɖe le nutome sue takpekpe aɖe me megbe la, wode dzesii be ehiã be yewoawɔ tɔtrɔ aɖewo le alesi yewowɔa nu kple yewo dada si nɔ teƒe bubu si woɖe le hamea me ƒe ade enye ma la ŋu.
Eyata míetu avɔgbadɔ ɖe ɖetsɔlemetɔ aɖe ƒe agble dzi.
Ne Saul kpɔ ŋutsu sesẽ alo kalẽtɔ aɖe ko la, ekplɔnɛ dea eƒe aʋawɔlawo dome.
Nunya anɔ eme be míade ŋugble le ale si afɔ gbegblẽ ɖeka ɖeɖe ate ŋu ana míaɖe afɔ gbegblẽ bubu, eye mlɔeba míava wɔ nu vɔ̃ gã aɖe la ŋu.
Gbɔgbɔmekekeli kple mɔkpɔkpɔ ƒe ŋugbedodo fakɔname aɖe nɔ Yesaya ƒe nyagblɔɖia me na wo—eyae nye be Yehowa agaɖo wo te le wo denyigbaa dzi!
Le dekɔnu aɖewo me la, wobunɛ be enye amemabumabu be ame aɖe nayɔ ame si tsi wui la ƒe ŋkɔ negbe ɖe ame tsitsia ŋutɔ gblɔ be wòayɔ ye nenema.
Esi nɔviŋutsu aɖe srɔ̃ ku eye eya ŋutɔ kpe fu geɖe la, egblɔ be: “Meva kpɔe be nu siwo me míato mele míawo ŋutɔ si me o, míate ŋu atia ɣeyiɣi kple zi nenie wòadzɔ ɖe mía dzi o.
Jahre Nebukadnezars II” (Ɣletiviŋutinunyala Aɖe Ƒe Nuŋlɔɖi Si Wòwɔ Le Nebukadnezar II Ƒe Ƒe 37 Lia Me), si Paul V.
ee (1 Mose 35:10, 22b-26) Le ɣeyiɣi aɖe megbe la, viaŋutsu siawo va zu Israel to 12-awo fofowo.
Nukata wòle vevie be míazã míaƒe aɖe nyuie?

Science magazine gblɔ be: “Kaka vidzĩwo naxɔ ɣleti 6 la, wonyaa ablɔɖegbeɖiɖiwo ƒe hatsotsowo, eye woléa to ɖe gbetɔtrɔ siwo fiaa nu vovovowo le wo degbe me ŋu, siwo ƒe ɖewoe nye ‘ee’ kple ‘a,’ eye woŋea aɖaba ƒua gbetɔtrɔ siwo ŋu gɔmesese mele o dzi.”
Yesu mate ŋu aŋe aɖaba aƒu numadzɔmadzɔwɔwɔ sia dzi o.

Ðe nèsena le ɖokuiwò me ɣeaɖewoɣi be boblododo atraɖii, dzitsitsi ɖe nunanawo ƒeƒle ŋu, atsyɔ̃ɖoɖo na atiwo, kplɔ̃ɖoɖowo ŋuti ɖoɖowɔwɔ kple wo dede, gbedonamegbalẽviwo ɖoɖo ɖe amewo—na woŋea aɖaba ƒua Yesu dzi le mɔ aɖe nua?
Wo ya bu nusi ate ŋu adzɔ ne míeŋe aɖaba ƒu nuheŋusẽ ƒe sea dzi, ti kpo tso xɔ kɔkɔ aɖe tame ŋu kpɔ ko!—Galatiatɔwo 6:7.
AIDS (Ðikanakudɔ) kple nulɔdɔ bubuwo, gbɔmeyafu, fuɖeɖe, ƒomedodowo me gbegblẽ, dzitsinya ƒe fuɖename sɔŋ ye le mɔ dzi na ame siwo tiae be yewoaŋe aɖaba aƒu mɔfiadzesi siawo tɔgbi dzi.
Gbã la, ɖetugbia ŋea aɖaba ƒua nusiawo dzi be togbɔ be mesɔ nenema o hã la, vividodoɖeameŋu ƒe ŋɔtimetete na ame koe wònye.
Nyatakaka la gblɔ be alesi Indiatɔ geɖe ŋea aɖaba ƒua vevesese suesuewo dzi alo hea dɔdada ɖe megbe gbɔe esia tso.
Ame geɖe ŋea aɖaba ƒua nu si esia fia la dzi, gake ele be nu ɖedzesi siwo le dzɔdzɔm tso ƒe 1914 me la nana míaka ɖe edzi bliboe be Mawu ƒe Fiaɖuƒea ava ɖe vɔ̃ɖinyenye ɖe sia ɖe ɖa kpuie.

De dzesi nya si Christoph Schönborn, si nye Vienna ƒe Katoliko bisiɔpgã la, gblɔ le The New York Times me, egblɔ be: “Nufiafia ɖe sia ɖe si melɔ̃na ɖe aɖaŋunuwɔwɔ ŋuti kpeɖodzi gbogbo siwo le nu gbagbe ŋuti nunya me dzi o alo dina be yeaŋe aɖaba aƒu edzi la menye dzɔdzɔmeŋutinunya o, ke boŋ nususugblɔ koe wònye.”
Ne dukɔ la ɖoe koŋ ŋe aɖaba ƒu ame ma ƒe nuwɔna dzi, eye womewui o, evɔ wònye etsɔ via sa vɔe na Molek hafi la,+ 5 ekema nye ŋutɔ maɖe ŋku atɔ ame ma kple eƒe ƒomea.
ee Ðe mawɔ ɖe Yehowa ƒe sewo dzi loo alo ɖe maŋe aɖaba aƒu wo dzia?
Agbagbadzedze be míaŋe aɖaba aƒu míaƒe dzitsinya ƒe fɔbuame dzi ate ŋu ana ŋusẽ navɔ le mía ŋu abe ale si ko dzomeŋɔli ƒe dzoxɔxɔ si nu sẽ la naa tsi vɔna le atiwo me ene.
Ne ɖe Mawu ŋe aɖaba ƒu nusianu dzi la, anye ne bubu aɖeke manɔ eƒe dzidzenuwo ŋu o.
Magazine sia gblɔ alɔ̃dɔdɔŋununyala Terry Young ƒe nya siwo wògblɔ be: “Amewo bua alɔ̃dɔdɔ be enye nusi dzi woate ŋu aŋe aɖaba aƒu bɔbɔe.
Menyae be nusiawo menyo o, gake medzea agbagba ŋea aɖaba ƒua edzi kple susu be enu ava yi le eɖokui si.
Wells gɔ̃ hã ŋlɔ bena: “Blema Roma-ŋutinyaŋlɔlawo ŋe aɖaba ƒu Yesu dzi keŋkeŋ; eŋuti nya aɖeke mele eƒe ɣeyiɣia me ŋutinya me nuŋlɔɖiwo me o.”
Ne hamemetsitsiwo xɔ ŋgɔ le dɔ sia wɔwɔ me la, woakpe ɖe hamea me tɔ bubuwo ŋu woakpɔe be mele be woaŋe aɖaba aƒu míaƒe Kristotɔwo ƒe dɔwo ƒe akpa sia dzi gbeɖe o.
Afɔku kae nye si wòanye na mí be míaɖe mɔ ɖe nu ŋu akpa le míaƒe ƒomea me aŋe aɖaba aƒu mía viwo ƒe vɔ̃wɔwɔ atraɖii dzi!
Ame Kae Ƒoe Ðe Amegbetɔwo Nu Be Woaŋe Aɖaba Aƒu Mawu Ƒe Sededewo Dzi?
Gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ le amesiame ŋu, eye ele be woaŋe aɖaba aƒu ɖewo dzi—tɔwòwo kple amesi ɖe ge nègbɔna la tɔwo siaa.
Ne vɔvɔ̃ ɖo wò le mɔnukpɔkpɔ aɖe si ʋu ɖi be nàtsɔ aɖi ɖase le wò dzixɔse ŋu ŋuti la, mègaŋe aɖaba ƒu gbedodoɖa le ɖoɖoezizi me ƒe mɔnukpɔkpɔ si le asiwò dzi o.
Ne womewɔe nenema o la, afɔkuwo ado tso eme na wo, abe ale si ko nu vevi ate ŋu awɔ ame ne eŋe aɖaba ƒu nuheŋusẽ ƒe sea dzi heti kpo tso xɔ kɔkɔ aɖe tame va dze anyigba la ene.
Aɖatsi lólona ɖe míaƒe ŋku dzi eye wòkpɔa egbɔ be aɖaba la manɔ ŋkua dzi klim o.
Dzɔdzɔmesewo abe nuheŋusẽ si dzi womate ŋu aŋe aɖaba aƒui eye magbe nugbegblẽ le ame ŋu o ene na seɖoƒe le amesiame ƒe ablɔɖe ŋu.
Le ƒe alafa siwo kplɔe ɖo me la, Israel-viwo—siwo me fia geɖe hã nɔ—ŋe aɖaba ƒu Mawu ƒe nuxlɔ̃amewo dzi.
Eƒe ŋkuwo lolo ŋutɔ hele yibɔɔ, eye eƒe aɖaba legbeawo tsyɔ wo dzi.
Mègakpɔ mɔ be viwòa adzudzɔ vinugbewɔwɔ kaba o, vevietɔ ne ekpɔe le ŋuwò be èwɔa yeƒe didiwo dzi na ye ne yewɔ vinugbe.

Esi mewɔ agbalẽ siwo hiã, wobia gbem, eye tagbɔdɔléleŋutinunyalawo dom kpɔ ɣleti geɖe megbe la, woɖe mɔ nam be mate ŋu adzudzɔ asrafodɔa faa—gake fifia ya abe ame si gbe be yemawɔ asrafodɔ o le dzitsinya ta ene.
Nu kae wòhiã be ame nawɔ hafi ate ŋu adzudzɔ amamaɖeɖenuwɔnawo kpɔkpɔ?
Le dadaa ƒe nyaƒoɖeamenu be wòayi gbolowɔwɔ dzi megbe la, egale na Maria be wòaʋli sesĩe adzudzɔ atikevɔ̃ɖizazã.
ÐE NÈSENA le ɖokuiwò me be amewo mate ŋu adzudzɔ nu fitifiti wɔwɔ o, eye be manya wɔ be enu nayi keŋkeŋ oa?
Gake míawo ya la, míate ŋu adzudzɔ nuƒoƒo tso nu siwo míekpɔ hese la ŋu o.”
Abe ale si Yanko wɔe ene la, àte ŋu adzudzɔ dziɖeleameƒonuwo ŋu bubu ahanɔ nu siwo ade dzi ƒo na wò la ŋu bum.
“SUSUŊUTINUNYALAWO ate ŋu adzudzɔ vihehe ƒe mɔnu nyuitɔ si dim wole ƒe alafa geɖewoe nye esia la didi azɔ—menye esi woke ɖe eŋu ta o, ke boŋ esi mele afi aɖeke o ta.”

Esi Papatenɔla Alfrink si megali o nɔ nu ƒom tso nunɔlawo ƒe vɔvɔ le Netherlands ŋuti la, eɖo ŋku ɣeyiɣi si me esi papa ƒe amedɔdɔ aɖe nɔ ŋku lém ɖe nunɔlawo ƒe suku aɖe ŋu le papatenɔla ƒe aƒea ŋkume la, edo ɣli bia eɖokui nusitae bisiɔpwo adzudzɔ xɔ dzeani siawo zazã
Ðe wòate ŋu adzɔ vavã be gbe ɖeka la, xexea me tɔwo katã adzudzɔ ame bubuwo bubu amedzrowoea?
Amesiwo ŋu wowɔa anyra le ate ŋu adzudzɔ nuƒoƒo tso suku ŋu alo klass gobii aɖe alo suku ƒe dɔwɔna aɖe ŋu.
Le go aɖewo me la, le ale si nuɖuɖua ɖea fu na amee ta la, ele be amea naƒo asa na nuɖuɖu mawo kura alo adzudzɔ wo ɖuɖu hena ɣeyiɣi aɖe.
Ate ŋu adzɔ be ame aɖewo nado kpo nu, atra mɔ, alo adzudzɔ.
Ne woƒe afɔ ɖo Yordan-tsia me la, tsi la adzudzɔ sisi.’
Nɔviŋutsu aɖe gblɔ nɛ be yeawɔ Biblia-nusɔsrɔ̃ kplii le Sidzedze-gbalẽa me gake le ɖoɖo sia nu be ŋutsua ate ŋu adzudzɔ ne yewosrɔ̃e zi ɖeka vɔ alo le ɣeyiɣi ɖesiaɖe megbe.
Ne amesiwo ƒo xlãm le enom la, edzroam kloe be magbɔ woƒe adzudzɔ, gake meɖea ɖokuinye ɖe aga enumake le esi nyemedi be atamanono ƒe dzodzroa nagaho ɖe menye ake o ta.”

Ðewohĩ woxɔe se be woate ŋu abu vasectomy kple tubal ligation be wosɔ kple fufɔfɔnutsitike siwo womina, kɔndɔm, kple aŋekotoku si wotsɔ xea vidzidɔa nu—siwo nye mɔnu siwo woate ŋu adzudzɔ ne ame di be yeafɔ fu.

Esiae nye zi gbãtɔ si Europa Ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒea lɔ̃ ɖe edzi be ele be woanɔ te ɖe se si ɖe mɔ ɖe ame ƒe susu, dzitsinya, kple subɔsubɔ ŋu dɔwɔwɔ ƒe ablɔɖe ŋu la dzi adzudzɔ nya tsɔtsɔ ɖe ame siwo ƒe dzitsinya meɖe mɔ na wo be woawɔ asrafodɔ o ŋu.
Eyata amesi ŋu OCD le eye wòkpɔ esia dze sii la ate ŋu adzudzɔ fɔɖiɖi madzemadzewo tsɔtsɔ wɔ fu eɖokui.
Nyati si do ŋgɔ na esia kpe ɖe mía ŋu míekpɔe be hafi míate ŋu ‘adzudzɔ agbenɔnɔ ɖe nuɖoanyi sia ƒe nɔnɔme nu’ la, ele be míagbe xexea ƒe nuŋububu kple eƒe nuwɔnawo.
Nu si wɔwɔ sesẽ nam koŋ ye nye ale si mawɔ adzudzɔ atamanono kple aha tsu nono.
Ðe wòfia be mɔ aɖeke meli na ameƒomea be woato edzi adzudzɔ fulélenu siwo wòwɔ va yi movitɔe la wɔwɔ ake oa?
Ŋutsu aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Troy, si Internet dzi amamaɖeɖenuwɔnawo kpɔkpɔ zu numame na tsã la gblɔ be: “Metsɔa susu ɖoa nu nyuiwo ŋu ale be mate ŋu adzudzɔ susu vɔ̃wo ŋu bubu.
Ema ko hafi míate ŋu adzudzɔ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ amewo le ale si wodzena le gotae la nu, abe ale si Yesu de se na mí ene.
Tatɔ si bua nu ŋu nyuie wu la adzudzɔ ame mawo yome titi—gake Farao ya, kpao.
Mɔ̃memia lé dzo vla kple adzudzɔ kɔtɔɔ yi dzisasrãa ŋu ɖo ta nuƒolanɔƒea, eye wòxɔ xɔa me katã.

Le kpɔɖeŋu me, ne míetsi dzi ɖe nusiwo ŋu míate ŋu awɔ naneke le o ŋuti la, ɖe manyo be míawɔ tɔtrɔwo le nusiwo míewɔna gbesiagbe ŋu alo adzo le afisi míele wu be míana nusiawo naxɔ míaƒe susu me anɔ fu ɖem na mí ɖaa oa?
Ðe woƒe susu adzo le nufiame veviwo dzi le esi womede blibo le ŋkuɖoɖonudzi me o ta?
Adzo la gɔmeɖeɖe ɖu ta na Filistitɔawo ŋkeke etɔ̃ sɔŋ.
